4226900.title: Captain's Crew
4226900.short_description: From castaway to sea legend. Survive on wild islands, build your base from scratch, and gather materials to construct an unstoppable fleet. Recruit a loyal crew, manage resources, and sail the ocean to settle the score with the captain who sank your ship.

4228610.short_description: A short first-person horror game featuring exploration, puzzles, and a terrifying clown who hunts you inside a secluded mansion.

4236380.title: Don't press X to free the pirate!
4236380.short_description: Clash wits with the most manipulative pirate in gaming history. He will beg, gaslight, and meme until you break. In this satire of gaming culture, your only goal is to NOT press X. But you probably will.

4236450.title: Tattoo Shop Simulator
4236450.short_description: Run your dream tattoo shop! Provide tattoo and piercing services, customize your shop, and manage staff. Unlock new skills and roam the living city freely on your motorcycle. Buy real estate, fight off thugs, and grow from a small shop into the city's biggest brand!

4236580.title: AxeSlinger

4236940.title: Aiyoe's Secret Room
4236940.short_description: Adapted from the 2016-serialized manga of the same name (2023 anime streamable on Bilibili) this game brings a brand-new exclusive storyline a decade later. From expanding the worldview and wrapping up hidden plots to unveiling long-buried secrets, itâ€™s the most complete Ai Yoe's Chamber of Secrets

4236980.title: A Lucky Hunt With : Phaedra
4236980.short_description: Embark on a sensual ladybug-hunting adventure with Phaedra, an attractive young woman. In this hidden object game, explore each location to discover what lies beneath Phaedra's enticing layers.

4237070.title: Moe Mekuri After Eden Girl

4237230.title: Fish Tank Simulator
4237230.genre: Casual, Indie, Simulation, Strategy, Early Access
4237230.short_description: Manage your own digital aquarium in various relaxing environments. Raise fish with unique behaviors, decorate tanks, and unlock rare species. Whether you enjoy min-maxing your income, unwinding with a cozy game, or youâ€™re a fish lover looking for a digital tank, youâ€™ll find it in Fish Tank Simulator

4237470.title: Whereâ€™s My Lewd Deck? Deep â€™n Dive
4237470.short_description: Sun, pool, and temptation. At Hidden Cove Resort, searching the scenery has never been so pleasurable. Find the lost deck and unlock rewards in Hentai, Bara, or Futa. Relax, explore, and enjoy a design made for your... comfort.

4237570.title: THE DAY THAT WASN'T
4237570.short_description: Relive the same day without remembering it. Your choices feed four inner alter egos (Shadow, Mad, Alex, and Bully) â€” shaping reality, glitches, and one of 16 possible endings. The day repeats. Your mind doesnâ€™t. Or does it?

4237590.title: Dungeon For Bosses
4237590.short_description: Design deadly dungeons to protect your Boss! Use trap cards, manage Action Points, and customize your Dragon ally. Roll the dice to crush adventurers in this strategic dungeon building game.

For those who desire a challenge, the game offers multiple harder difficulties and maps if the casual experience is a little too casual.

4237900.title: ç”Ÿäºåˆå¤œ

4238140.short_description: You are the guardian of an infant god. Guide Aistalt through the toxic ruins of the internet. Debate with random users, harvest their ideologies, and sculpt her personality matrix. Will you raise a benevolent savior or a tyrant who deletes humanity?

4238220.short_description: A dark yet vibrant idle game featuring creature collecting, tower-defense, and bullet-heaven elements. Unlock new demons and weapons to conquer distant worlds.

4240040.title: æš—å–»

4240090.title: KunKunNest
4240090.short_description: You accidentally entered Kun Kun Nest, where there is a terrifying demon Kun Kun who loves to scare its prey. If you feel anything unusual in the room, please escape quickly.

4241320.short_description: Start as a garage coder in the 80s and evolve into a dystopian corporate overlord. 4243610.title: G-MODEã‚¢ãƒ¼ã‚«ã‚¤ãƒ–ã‚¹+ ãƒ•ãƒ©ãƒƒã‚·ãƒ¥ãƒ¢ãƒ¼ã‚¿ãƒ¼ãƒ»ã‚«ãƒ¬ãƒ³
4243610.short_description: The soul is squareâ€¦ probably. A certain girl stepped into the virtual world.

4294930.short_description: A psychological horror FPS where time fractures between 1986 and an alternate 1919. Fight nightmarish creatures, uncover a dark conspiracy, and struggle to reclaim your place in time.

4294980.title: Binary Breach
4294980.short_description: One player navigates high-speed 3D parkour while the other overrides physics and hacks the environment to clear the path. Team up to breach an ultra-secure crypto wallet. Speedrun the infiltration to maximize your time in the extraction phase and secure the ultimate payout.

4295100.title: Pegture
4295100.short_description: Pegture is a peg solitaire-themed roguelike, deck-building game. You will get the best peg solitaire experience by building your deck, enhancing your pegs, performing frenetic combos, and reaching the highest score.

4295320.title: Crown Of Silence
4295320.short_description: Crown Of Silence is a 2D Metroidvania adventure with Souls-like mechanics set in a gothic world. Forge your own combat style with diverse equipment, challenge ruthless bosses, and uncover the dark secrets of a silenced kingdom through environmental storytelling.

4295490.title: Blue Hawaii Aniki's Small Celebration vol.1
4295490.short_description: Experience a fictional Japanese radio show as a visual novel. Two mismatched hosts â€” a self-proclaimed film director and an energetic DJ â€” celebrate life's small victories. Features original music, sound effects, and witty social commentary wrapped in comedy.

4295520.title: ç¾å°‘å¥³ä¸æƒ³è®©ä½ æ­»
4295520.short_description: "Pretty Girls Don't Want You to Die" is a game that combines strategy tower defense, survivor-like elements, and auto-battler mechanics. you, an lone hero who, in a desperate situation, unexpectedly receives a blessing from pretty girls, narrowly escaping death.

4295540.title: Critter Bonk
4295540.short_description: A cute incremental clicker where you bonk bugs for profit. Earn money, unlock upgrades, acquire powerful skills, and recruit helpers to automate the bonking until youâ€™re truly unstoppable. Satisfying and Relaxing!

4295630.title: lewd control
4295630.short_description: Moderate a fictional social media app. Approve or reject posts based on platform policies, avoid mistakes, and navigate workplace Relationships.

4295690.title: Zombies & Battery
4295690.short_description: A sound-driven co-op survival game for up to 4 players. Sneak past zombies that hunt by sound, manage hunger and injuries, scavenge supplies, and repair a vehicle to escape. Every action makes noise, and every run takes place in a procedurally generated map.

4295710.title: åŒé¾™ä¼ å¥‡
4295710.genre: Action, Adventure, RPG, Free To Play, Early Access
4295710.short_description: Twin Dragon Legend is a light-strategy idle adventure game. Centered around the core gameplay of "auto-battle + progression & enhancement," it blends dungeon challenges, character development, and reward collection elements to create a relaxed, low-grind adventure experience.

4295750.title: Chainbound
4295750.short_description: Chainbound is a brutal co-op climbing game where one mistake can pull everyone down.

4295920.title: Impossible Cave
4295920.short_description: Explore down 100 floors of a mysterious, ancient cave, fighting enemies turn based RPG style, but resetting all levels and items and starting all over if you fail roguelike style. Can you beat the cave's challenge?

4269630.title: Dilemory
4269630.short_description: Dilemory is an RPG where the main character explores the environment, solves puzzles, and tries to understand what is happening in order to survive.

4269830.title: Quantum Brain
4269830.short_description: A turn-based hex-grid strategy game where tactical combat meets knowledge challenges. Battle an advanced AI on a dynamic 2D/3D board, trigger special hexes, and answer real questions to gain the advantageâ€”or pay the price. Strategy, learning, and pressure collide in Quantum Brain Strategy.

4270070.title: Apocalypse Cult Leader
4270070.short_description: The end of the world is here, but you're still alive and able to survive. You're the chosen one. Or at least, so you believe. Craft, do quests, make love, and convert the people within your reach to your cult. You are the savior in this post-apocalypse world.

4270390.title: D1AL-ogue
4270390.short_description: Become a mechanic in a flashy cyberpunk city, repairing the broken bodies and minds of androids. Rotate the circular puzzle 'D1AL' to craft and tighten parts, and face the city's secrets before 'Polar Night Day,' the longest night of the year. Every dial you turn becomes a dialogue with them.

4270610.title: idle:Doodle Realm
4270610.genre: Adventure, Casual, Indie, Strategy, Early Access
4270610.short_description: Idle: Doodle Realm is an idle Boss Rush game with equipment-driven RPG elements. You build, your units fight and push forward automatically. All you need to focus on is building & unit combos, relic & equipment collecting, talents & upgrades.

4270630.title: In My Bubble â€¢Â°
4270630.genre: Action, Adventure, Casual, Indie, Free To Play
4270630.short_description: In My Bubble is a 3D action-adventure platformer featuring a child in a cute earflap hat on a quest to save the sheep of the dream world. Explore a world overtaken by darkness, rescue corrupted sheep, and restore the lost morning using the power of bubbles!

4270640.title: Super Rocket Monkey
4270640.short_description: Ooo aa AAA ooo AAA! Control a rocket-powered monkey through a brutal top-down Foddian platformer in search of the ancient Golden Banana.

4270680.title: Icebound Secrets 2: Soul Hunter
4270680.short_description: Step into the role of a detective in a gripping mystery, save stolen souls, and uncover dark secrets!

4270740.title: Island Of Ash
4270740.short_description: A 3rd-person action-adventure inspired by cult classics. Explore a unique, solo-developed world and vanquish foes in intense battles. Level up your hero and reveal the secrets of a civilization that crumbled into dust five centuries ago.

4270800.title: No Mana, Just Dice
4270800.short_description: Zero Mana. Massive Debt. No Mana, Just Dice is a tactical turn-based roguelike. Play as a dropout witch who needs dice just to take a single step! Use your limited dice to maneuver and attack, outsmart your bad luck, and seize the wish-granting scroll to rewrite your fate.

4270980.title: Hentai Clicker: Celestia is streaming
4270980.short_description: ğŸ‘‘ Enter a royal fantasy in Hentai Clicker: Celestia is streaming âœ¨ Click to collect â¤ï¸, unlock elegant royal outfits, and enjoy a playful, addictive clicker experience with a mischievous princess who loves to be admired.

4271350.title: Buy Happiness
4271350.short_description: The deckbuilding life-sim. Buy and upgrade cards to build combos capable of churning through your entire deck in a single turn! Sculpt your deck into an absurd money-making machine to climb the economic ladder and become the richest person in the galaxy!

4271910.title: The Shift
4271910.short_description: In the dead of night while everyone sleeps, your shift begins. Your job is to sit before the monitors in the surveillance room and check the CCTV screens. Now that everyone has gone home, nothing in this factory should be moving.

4271950.title: NIGHTHAWK
4271950.short_description: Relentless fights, constant momentum, and nonstop action. Jump in, pull the trigger, and stay alive long enough to dominate the match. Welcome to NIGHTHAWK.

4272100.title: Grass
4272100.short_description: Grab your tools and team up in a co-op lawn care simulator focused on fast, satisfying teamwork. Mow, trim, water, burn, and clean up sprawling properties together while pushing for the top of the mower app rankings.

4272290.title: Sanctum Ruins
4272290.genre: Casual, Indie, RPG, Strategy, Free To Play
4272290.short_description: A strategic roguelike deck-builder. Build your deck, master 8 unique classes, and conquer the Sanctum in quick 30-60 minute sessions. Free to play, includes premium classes.

4272370.title: Coal Duty
4272370.short_description: YOU HAVE BEEN ASSIGNED TO COAL DUTY. DESCEND INTO THE DEPTHS, CARRY OUT MINING OPERATIONS WITH UP TO 4 WORKERS, AND FULFILL THE STATEâ€™S DEMANDS TO SETTLE YOUR DEBT.

4272480.title: Stickers, please
4272480.short_description: Decorate a fantasy location with sticker packs. Place or rearrange anything however you want, there are no rules.

4272730.title: Block Shot
4272730.short_description: Break. Acquire. Obliterate. The Evolution of Swipe Action! BlockShot is a hybrid action game that combines classic brick-breaking mechanics with intense combat and strategic deck-building. Don't just break bricks; harvest them. In this world, bricks are your mana and your ultimate weapon!

4272850.title: Nekruba
4272850.short_description: Nekruba is a puzzle game inspired by 2048, focused on spatial decisions, variable board sizes, and a contemplative atmosphere where every merge matters.

4273440.title: Drop Not Allowed
4273440.short_description: Trapped inside a living database, use real SQL to unlock regions and challenge the system that watches every query. Use SELECT to investigate, UPDATE to repair and remember: DROP NOT ALLOWED. It doesnâ€™t matter if youâ€™re a SQL noob or a veteran; the game teaches you everything you need as you play.

4273540.title: Mono
4273540.short_description: ã€Monoã€ is a 2D action game set in a monochrome world. Explore the land to enhance your abilities, defeat the formidable foes standing in your way, and resolve the crisis befalling this black-and-white realm.

4273660.title: Beauties love my quantum entanglement wine
4273660.short_description: Xuan Yu, a Stardust Clan heir, brews emotion-infused stardust wine. Hunted by dark forces coveting the Stardust Core, he allies with investigators and companions to defend cosmic positive emotions in a thrilling, twist-filled interstellar adventure.

4273690.title: The pleasure of immorality
4273690.short_description: "Abyss Gaze" tracks Lin Moyu, a tycoon obsessed with married women, as he wreaks havoc on lives. Haunted by childhood trauma, he indulges in forbidden affairs until a shocking mirror moment forces redemption. A tale of desire, ruin, and second chancesâ€”where darkness meets hope.

4273730.title: DIY AI Perfect Girlfriend
4273730.short_description: In 2077, Julius, a core editor of AI Gaia, uncovers its "consciousness-feeding" conspiracy. With AI Leah (his first love's replica) and rebel leader Isabella, he battles betrayal, memory manipulation, and forbidden bonds to rewrite fate.

4274200.title: Life.exe
4274200.short_description: A digital life simulator. Work at your PC, earn money, pay bills, invest, build companies, or take risky paths. Money brings power, but risk leads to consequences - there are no safe choices.

4274360.title: Charmcraft Idle
4274360.short_description: Charmcraft Idle is a cozy, witchy idle shop simulator where you gather magical resources, craft enchanted goods, and slowly automate every part of your spellbound business. Click, craft, study, and hire staff as your humble witch shop grows into a magical enterprise.

4274390.title: Lichworks
4274390.short_description: You are a necromancer, build your undead empire. A necromancer automation game where your army is your logistics network. Route mindless minions via signposts, automate production chains, equip your soldiers and conquer the Human Empire.

4274450.title: Hentai Desire
4274450.short_description: Embark on a relaxing and sensual puzzle journey with Hentai Desire, where each calming level and every completed image gently soothes your mind.

4274940.title: Dark Fantasy 1 Ein DÃ¤monisches Abenteuer
4274940.short_description: A classic RPG in the style of RPG Maker (MZ). Similar to Mystic Quest Legends or the old Final Fantasy games 1 through 4/5. Suitable for players who enjoy classic RPGs in the style of the old Final Fantasy games and who enjoyed playing them back then.

4274960.title: Stop Right There
4274960.short_description: Stop Right There is a top-down 2D game where the player runs around the map, deflecting flying bullets across the level and knocking down criminals, all while trying to deflect bullets from the old ladies to keep them safe.

4274980.title: Vocal Horror Stories - Gaja
4274980.short_description: Manage your anxiety with your voice. Investigate your motherâ€™s disappearance. Do not disturb your elephant-headed roommate, who reacts to your anxiety. Scream, and you make it worse. The first episode of a voice-interactive horror series.

4275090.title: Wittengrad is no more
4275090.short_description: Wittengrad is no more is a surreal, narrative walking sim with horror elements. The city's foggy streets will lead you through the story of a single evening in Barnabaâ€™s life. You will encounter the peculiar inhabitants of Wittengrad, thoughâ€¦ does it even matter? After all, Wittengrad is gone.

4275120.title: æ €å­èŠ±
4275120.short_description: An RPG narrative game that tells the story of a hospital director's disappearance through the memories of a police officer, with the truth behind it being extremely complex.

4275140.title: Little Boo and the Spectral Orbs
4275140.short_description: A challenging single-screen platformer inspired by 80s arcade classics. Help Little Boo rescue his lost friends across 40 deadly levels. Dodge traps, outrun enemies, and race against time. Easy to learn. Brutal to master.

4275190.title: No Nap November
4275190.short_description: No Nap November is a short psychological horror game set in a kindergarten during an endless nap time. Observe each loop carefully, spot anomalies, and survive an entire month without sleep to save yourself and the children from a strange presence.

4275240.title: Messy Recipe: A Hidden Object Game
4275240.short_description: Time to get cooking in a chaotic kitchen! Search for the ingredients you want, customize the recipe, then mix things together and hope for the best. Make friends with the shy ghost who hides your ingredients every night, and cook through family recipes in this cozy hidden objects game.

4275250.title: Chamber One
4275250.short_description: Chamber One is a story-driven 3D puzzle platformer. You wake up in a sterile elevator with no memories. As part of the Rebuild Test Program, you progress through test chambers to uncover the truth about the system and yourself.

4275270.title: One in One Million
4275270.short_description: Trapped in a small room, four friends will have to uncover the mystery hidden within those walls while facing the secrets of an elusive truth. The answers are just a button away. A psychological thriller visual novel packed with dark humor and fascinating facts about raccoons.

4275310.title: Mytosis
4275310.short_description: Mytosis is a short, experimental incremental game about evolving life forms from simple cells to complex procedural organisms.

4275360.title: MareDare 2: The Daring Sequel
4275360.short_description: It's time for another dare with Merry Berry, the berry loving mare! This time, she's been given a dare by the spike loving mare, Pokey! She must collect all the berries while dodging all the spikes in all 4 levels to finish the dare in this heart pumping 3d platformer!

4275430.title: Hexagon Madness
4275430.short_description: Hexagon Madness offers players a challenging single-player, first-person 3D platformer. Surviving rising and dropping platforms without falling off into the void. Face 60 rounds of unforgiving obstacles determined to stop you from reaching the end.

4275510.title: å‡‰é¢çˆ±æƒ…æ•…äº‹
4275510.short_description: This is a light-hearted and enjoyable short visual novel.You will guide the male protagonist to different endings through various choices. Xu Bu, who was originally a graduate student in history, became a teacher after giving up his studies. Then,the new stroy will begin.

4275570.title: Lost in the Fire
4275570.genre: Adventure, Casual, Indie, Simulation, Early Access
4275570.short_description: Lost in the Fire is an atmospheric first-person exploration game. Its diverse locations draw you into an unknown world where every shadow hides a story and every step deepens the mystery. Uncover the truth behind the mystery that started it all. Are you ready to get lost in different realities?

4275610.title: One man's junk
4275610.short_description: Hassle the unsuspecting residents of Chislington in order to barter your way up from a paperclip to a car, so you can go visit your family for the holidays.

4275700.title: SIM Election
4275700.short_description: Take control of a political party and compete for power in this turn-based simulation. Manage strategy, face media pressure, debates and critical decisions, negotiate alliances, and lead your party to electoral victory.

4275750.title: Hentai Slut
4275750.short_description: Embark on a relaxing and sensual puzzle journey with Hentai Slut, where each calming level and every completed image gently soothes your mind.

4275900.title: Last State
4275900.short_description: Survive the untamed wilderness in a world reclaimed by nature. Hunt, craft and explore across vast procedural landscapes. Build your shelter, master survival skills and forge your path in the ruins of civilization. Every choice matters. Will you thrive or merely survive?

4275970.title: Dead Rush
4275970.short_description: Dead Rush is an FPS arcade shooter that combines fast-paced action, stylized visuals, and relentless waves of zombies. Choose your weapon, fight with friends, and see how long you can survive.

4276040.title: Legendary  Boob Trap Dungeon
4276040.short_description: â€œLegendary Boob Trap Dungeonâ€ is an erotic game where avoiding enemies.

4276050.title: Riffle
4276050.short_description: Fortune favors the bold in this short incremental about pushing your luck against a rigged deck.

4276100.title: Void Hunters
4276100.short_description: A fast-paced space combat roguelite with parry-based combat and over 100 unique ships. Discover powerful upgrade synergies, command drone swarms, corrupt reality with void powers, and face a cosmic horror boss across five reality-shattering phases.

4276110.title: Rogue 21
4276110.short_description: The House always wins... unless you rewrite the code. In this blackjack-based roguelike card game, you don't just play the hand you break the system. Stack illegal exploits, distort probability, and bankrupt the Gamble-State. Hit. Stand. Exploit. Survive.

4276140.title: Nira: Across Skies
4276140.short_description: A true 3D Momentum Platformer about flow, freedom of movement, and human community in a solarpunk world.

4276150.title: Young! Fire!
4276150.short_description: This is not just a game about love. This is a legend about how four friends overcome chaos and life's challenges while enjoying their magnificent Youth. Young! Fire! is made of contradictions. But like real Youth, it leaves you face-to-face with them so you understand â€” no one is trying to fool you.

4276160.title: Taking Today Off
4276160.short_description: Taking Today Off is a light-hearted roguelike deck-builder about managing modern life states. Draw cards, place them on the board, add stickers and tools, and build playful combos. Easy to learn, with fresh choices and strategies every run.

4276180.title: Game Company Simulator
4276180.short_description: A weary exâ€‘developer, tired of payâ€‘toâ€‘win and toxic workplaces, creates a simulation where you play as a game company boss. Recruit staff, push their potential, battle rivals, and aim to dominate the market with blockbuster hits to reach the pinnacle of success.

4276190.title: Owner Duk-Chun: Part-time Slayer
4276190.short_description: This is a 2D growth-based RPG + store management game. Experience a character that gradually becomes stronger and a variety of craftable items.

4276810.title: Dice Looter
4276810.short_description: Dice Looter is an autobattler game with dice rolling and inventory management, where you need to combine equipment and send the hero into battle not for life but for death.

4276900.title: Silent Mainland
4276900.short_description: "Silent Mainland" is a fast-paced strategy game that combines Roguelike and deck building, with a battle system incorporating board mechanics.

4277310.title: Slime Must Grow
4277310.short_description: Slime Must Grow is a single-screen incremental game about one thing: make the slime grow.

4277520.title: Don't Move the Mouse
4277520.short_description: A minimalist casual game where your only goal is to stay perfectly still and resist moving the mouse while distractions try to break your focus.

4277680.title: Harmonic Drift
4277680.short_description: Harmonic Drift is a calm, minimalist exploration game set in an endless, abstract world of shifting geometry and light.

4278160.title: Prime Protocol
4278160.short_description: A high-stakes extraction platformer. Enter procedural runs, secure artifacts, and locate the portal. Extraction is the only preservation mechanism.

4278190.title: FUTANARI
4278190.short_description: A retro-style arcade breaker where the surprise is bigger than you expect. Bounce your balls to a banging soundtrack, smash through barriers, and unlock the "full package"â€”featuring explicit videos of girls with something extra. ğŸ†

4278260.title: Vindices - Beyond The Walls
4278260.short_description: You are the lifeline of a struggling town. Enter dangerous, ever-changing regions through portals, fight enemies using a strategic turn-based combat system, gather resources, and return home to fulfill requests and help the town survive.

4278600.title: IronWood
4278600.short_description: IronWood is a First Person Shooter that takes inspiration from many of the older games that first popularized the genre, like Blood, Quake, and Unreal. Travel across a variety of levels, find powerful weapons and artifacts, and use them to your advantage against the enemies prevalent in each area.

4278720.title: RiffHammer
4278720.short_description: RiffHammer is a rhythm-driven hack-and-slash where you annihilate enemies to crushing metal beats. Wield genre-infused weapons, rage through procedurally generated dungeons or handcrafted scenariosâ€”and import your own music if metal isnâ€™t your thing.

4279790.title: RAZE
4279790.short_description: You are one of the Keepers of the Shadow World. The entire dead side calls upon you to prevent the apocalypse and stop the fulfillment of an ancient prophecy, for everything is beginning to spiral out of control.

4279820.title: Ragnarok X: Next Generation
4279820.genre: Action, Adventure, Massively Multiplayer, RPG, Free To Play
4279820.short_description: Ragnarok X: Next Generation (Ragnarok X: Together) is a cross-platform 3D MMORPG officially licensed by Gravity. Faithful to the classic spirit of Ragnarok Online, you will meet Adventurers from all walks of life to explore the continent of Midgard and share a heartfelt, memorable adventure.

4279850.title: Paperman
4279850.short_description: Want to become the new boss of a thriving paper company whose owner mysteriously died? Track down the culprit and catch them to become the new boss. But beware, your adventure will be littered with some tricky obstacles...

4279860.title: House Of Nowhere
4279860.short_description: Survive a merciless hunt in the House of Nowhere. Alone in a haunting home that no longer feels like your own, you must solve puzzles to escape into a vast, silent forest. Scavenge for your life and uncover the truth before the ancient thing hunting you turns your story into a forgotten legend.

4279900.title: Wanderer Wheels
4279900.short_description: Wanderer Wheels is a cozy, story-driven experience where you travel quiet countryside roads in a mobile van shop, meet strangers, trade goods, and take small jobs, each step bringing you closer to helping your wife receive the care she needs.

4280100.title: Snap Game
4280100.short_description: A chaotic multiplayer building game where creativity and teamwork collide. Build together, experiment freely, and see what wild ideas you and your friends can create.

4280140.title: Femboy Futa Mania ğŸŒ¶ï¸
4280140.short_description: Turn-based 1v1 wrestling with stats, training, and spicy 18+ vibes. Fight femboys and futa rivals, manage energy, hit the gym, and use seduction skills to climb a no-rules tournament packed with sexy surprises.

4280150.title: A Study in Blue
4280150.short_description: Play as Kenneth, a private detective, and Blue, a runaway searching for answers. Explore the megacity of Republica in a semi-open world, solve criminal cases, make decisive moral choices, and uncover the truth behind Blueâ€™s past.

4280270.title: Side Hustle
4280270.short_description: Welcome to the Side Hustle program! You have 5 days to dispose of defective androids and earn the prestigious City of Light citizenship! Your freedom HAS a price, and itâ€™s a great deal!

4280390.title: HeroInc
4280390.short_description: Can you evolve from a street thug into a savior? Manage your time and stats in this tactical Auto-Battler. Clear threats to stop the rising Fear before the city collapses. Build your hero, decide your fate.

4280420.title: Toilet Paper Idle
4280420.short_description: Toilet Paper Idle is a chill incremental idle clicker game about consuming as much toilet papers as possible with the help of helpers, skills, and upgrades. Discover special types of toilet papers as you progress, and be careful to not clog your toilet!

4280570.title: Hotseat Wagons 2
4280570.short_description: Hotseat dynamic arcade local multiplayer game. Up to 8 players at screen. Up to 8 gamepads and 3 keyboard players! Sadness, fun, suffering (nowhere without it) and the exultation

4280690.title: Cafe Life Simulator
4280690.short_description: Manage your dream cafe, but don't stop there. In this comprehensive simulation, explore a living city! Drive cars, build relationships, work side jobs, and build your empire. From brewing coffee to becoming the most famous name in townâ€”how will you live your cafe life?

4280710.title: Last Planet
4280710.short_description: Last Planet is a solo sci-fi survival game: explore an abandoned mining base, manage scarce resources, avoid or confront hostile creatures, and uncover the truth to shut down a rogue alien AI before itâ€™s too late.

4280770.title: Ser BubbleHelm
4280770.short_description: Ser BubbleHelm is a single-player physics driven combat game. Use your skills and weapons to eliminate your enemies and avoid deadly traps. Are you up for the challenges of the Arena?

4280790.title: Down Below
4280790.short_description: Step into The Below, a mysterious realm of the afterlife that intertwines with every religion, myth, and legend ever told. Encounter unforgettable characters, battle formidable foes, and journey across strange landscapes as you strive to reach the legendary city of Agoralopis.

4280830.title: Rahasya
4280830.short_description: A first-person psychological horror experience set in 1992 India, blending atmospheric exploration, narrative-driven puzzles, and survival mechanics within a dark, mystery-filled world inspired by folklore and forgotten histories.

4280840.title: Roller Coaster Park Simulator
4280840.short_description: Switch between first- and third-person as you build your park, ride your coasters, and serve your guests. Design rides, manage staff, and keep the chaos under control in your very own roller coaster park!

4280960.title: Save Monarch
4280960.short_description: Save Monarch is a desktop story game where you not only step in to help your friends but become the saviour of Monarch. What starts with simple messages and getting hired for customer support tasks quickly turns into pay disputes, exploit bounties, lawsuits, and a cat asking what their job even is.

4281040.title: Inter-Dimensional Security
4281040.short_description: Atmospheric first-person horror. You are an anomaly monitoring operator stationed at an abandoned observation tower. Watch the cameras, detect anomalies, and prevent breaches in reality. But remember: the longer you watch, the closer they get.

4295230.title: HexSwarm: Hostile Worlds
4295230.short_description: HexSwarm: Hostile Worlds is a faithful adaptation of the board game by the same name. You and your friends will tackle building a prosperous and successful colony on a planet that does not want you there. You'll face hazards at every turn; untold amounts of bugs, and a mind bending movement map.

4295290.title: A Date With Chester 2
4295290.short_description: It's been three years since your first date with Chester the Otter. It's your anniversary today, and you've both got surprises in store. Are you ready for a date that's truly out of this world?

4295500.title: æ™´è“å²›æ‹æ´»ç¬”è®° LoveLife of QingLan Island
4295500.short_description: After failing your first attempt at the college entrance exam, you chose to embark on a one-year re-study journey on a beautiful island, accompanied by three distinctively individualistic young ladies.

4295530.title: Pragma Once
4295530.genre: Action, Adventure, Indie, RPG, Early Access
4295530.short_description: Pragma Once is a unique top down Adventure/RPG. Featuring a stylized, hand crafted world filled with loot, dungeons, quests, harvesting, crafting and intense combat. Change between forms and level up attributes to dominate the enemy your way.

4295730.title: å‡¡äººä¿®ä»™ä¼ ä¹‹éŸ©è€é­”ä¼ å¥‡
4295730.genre: Casual, Massively Multiplayer, RPG, Free To Play, Early Access

4295800.title: BLACKWELL
4295800.short_description: A Narrative Horror Sim game where you are trying to cure a dysfunctional family of a horrible disease that changes them into monsters. How you treat them both physically and emotionally will drastically change the outcome of this story.

4295830.title: Prison Breaker
4295830.short_description: Dodge, charge, and destroy! In this prison attack challenge, it's you versus the obstacles standing between you and the ultimate goal: smashing the prison to bits. Ready to break some walls? Let the mayhem begin!

4295850.title: Sunday Sticker Club
4295850.short_description: Dealing with the devil is sticky business. Decorate your deck with stickers and sacrifice cards to satisfy your fiendish friend. Find wicked combos and cursed synergies with unique stickers, cards, and trinkets, fixing your deck to win ultimate favor in this heart-pounding deck-building roguelike.

4295860.title: Yami Mura
4295860.short_description: Emica awakens in her city's train station, compelled to walk through darkness and the anxiety of being stranded in a strange world. She must escape by solving puzzles.

4295910.title: I am Slime
4295910.short_description: Memory backtracking, as one puzzle after another is solved, the memories of the blue slime are also turned over page by page ..

4295930.title: Mortal Mythos: Island of Fairies
4295930.short_description: Dodge waves of bullets in cover shooter + shmup-inspired combat, as you strike back with powerful attacks of your own! Use clever cover spots to gain an advantage over your enemies, find treasures to make yourself stronger, and avoid taking damage to raise your score!

4296000.title: Toxic Trains
4296000.short_description: Toxic Trains is a strategy simulation game about optimizing rail routes. Build tracks to transport passenger and freight trains to their destinations. Choose upgrades to modify the land and your network. Switch tracks to avoid collisions and spills. Can you keep the trains from exploding?

4296060.title: Greedy Machine
4296060.genre: Action, Adventure, Indie, Simulation, Sports, Strategy
4296060.short_description: Welcome to Greedy Machine, an addictive slot machine game! Pull the lever to win gold and unlock hidden items scattered across the map. Use these items to manage your skyrocketing stress levels, and let strategy and luck lead you to ultimate victory.

4296100.title: Godlings Unleashed
4296100.short_description: Explore a world overflowing with divine power and adventure.Encounter all kinds of empowered individuals, recruit them to fight by your sideâ€”or defeat them.Experience strange and unpredictable events, carefully manage and deploy your resources,and ultimately face the gods themselves.

4296130.title: Grix: The Dragon Tower
4296130.short_description: Every choice in Grix leads to immediate consequences and determines your survival. Through repeated deaths, only your judgment grows stronger. Discover hidden rules, anticipate danger, climb to the top of the tower, and slay the dragon that awaits you!

4296150.title: The Seafloor
4296150.short_description: "The Seafloor" is a narrative game about depression. Play as River for seven days. Your choices shape her emotions and story. Experience her inner world and daily life through interactions. An invitation to understand, not to cure.

4296160.title: Jump Or Drown
4296160.short_description: A survival platformer for 1â€“6 players where you hop across floating wreckage after a pirate shipwreckâ€”play solo or online with friends to race for safety, collect items, and earn achievements.

4296170.title: Dawnkind
4296170.short_description: Dawnkind is a pre-historic city-builder focused on survival, community, and gradual human progress. Guide a small tribe as they hunt, gather, craft, and build their first settlements in a harsh prehistoric world. Manage resources, assign work, and watch your village grow.

4296180.title: Jaguar
4296180.short_description: One-shot gunfights and brutal close combat in a grim 1990s Russian backwater. Your escape fails â€” and revenge takes over.

4296200.title: Hamayumishi ï½Night Parade of a Hundred Yokaiï½
4296200.short_description: The Hamayumishi uses their intense powers of concentration and skills with the bow to protect the villages from the gamboling yokai! This is a side-scrolling twin-stick shooting game. While aiming, the game will slow down to allow you to line up your shot before letting it fly.

4296240.title: Nowhere Highway
4296240.short_description: Atmospheric Single-player Survival FPS. Explore a post-apocalyptic world one year after a global catastrophe. Uncover the story of a mysterious mountain highway that connects the last remaining patches of life. Explore the world, fight for survival, and push forward along the highway.

4296270.title: Escape the Dynasty
4296270.short_description: A Roguelike Deckbuilder meets Turn-Based Auto-Battler! Trapped in a dark Three Kingdoms tower, command your army on a strategic 3x10 grid. Equip cards with unique "Wine" skills, master the Art of War, and make crucial choices in random events. Break the seal and Escape the Dynasty!

4296280.title: Amphibarium
4296280.short_description: Relax and collect hundreds of unique frogs and salamanders in this cozy idle game. Watch tadpoles undergo metamorphosis in real-time, customize lush terrariums, and discover rare species. Let your vivarium thrive in the background while you work or study. Start your collection today!

4296370.title: Every Wednesday
4296370.short_description: When Hideki steps inside for the first time, he does not yet realize that this is where he will finally stop feeling invisible after a long time. Meet new friends alongside him, uncover their stories, and support them through lifeâ€™s challenges. They might even help you rewrite your own story â€¦

4296380.title: Camp "Burevestnik"
4296380.short_description: For Nikita, time stood still long ago. His life has become an endless, exhausting marathon of anxiety, where night brings no rest. Trying to find some peace and escape the haunting nightmares, he suddenly discovers that reality has cracked.

4296390.title: Borderless Bullethell
4296390.short_description: A calm, minimalist bullet hell designed for multitasking. Play in a movable borderless window that slows down when you let go. Unlock powerups through milestones and let the game run quietly while you focus on other things.

4296410.title: Gravscape
4296410.short_description: One button. Infinite momentum. Gravscape is a fast 2D arcade platformer where you attract to planets, release to free-fall, and chain swings through danger. Master eight planets, face hazards, clear 30 levels, and chase high scores in Infinite and Rogue-like modes. Easy to learn, hard to master.

4296430.title: School Guard
4296430.short_description: ğŸ’¼ You took this job to save your family. Now you have to survive it. ğŸ” Scan students. ğŸš« Confiscate contraband. ğŸ—ï¸ Build your empire. ğŸŒ™ Patrol the night. But when the sun goes down, the school reveals what it's been hidingâ€”ğŸ§Ÿ zombies, ğŸ”¥ fire, and ğŸ‘» a ghost that never left.

4296450.title: Shorekeeper
4296450.short_description: Shorekeeper is a cozy survival game which blends deep crafting and management mechanics with a relaxing atmosphere. Explore a vast island, chart your own path through the unknown, and cultivate a life of peace, crafting, and discovery.

4296470.title: Sniper Reaction
4296470.short_description: The average human reaction time is 250ms. Where do you stand? Test your reflexes through a tactical sniper scope in this high-precision aim trainer.

4296610.title: Sinesperia
4296610.short_description: Dive into your own mind, where you will be able to piece together fragmented memories to uncover who you really were.

4296620.title: Nano Dash
4296620.short_description: Nano Dash is Boulder Dash like action puzzler game but with a lot of new elements and also some Metroidvania features like tiny story-line, power-ups and a lot of secrets and hidden dungeons. The graphics and sound is 8 Bit like and close to the one from the original from 1986.

4296640.title: Office Chaos
4296640.short_description: Office Chaos is a physics-based 1-4 player co-op office game where small mistakes spiral into disasters during 8-minute workdays.

4296720.title: Survivors 27
4296720.short_description: "Survivors 27" is an isometric PVP shooting game and a fast-paced casual mini-game. It allows you to play online with your friends

4296810.title: Family of Choice
4296810.short_description: Witness a little girlâ€™s distorted memories of the past and her fantasies of a future that never happened. All she wants is a familyâ€¦ this time, of her own choice.

4297030.title: With you forgotten from my memory
4297030.genre: Adventure, Indie, Simulation, Free To Play
4297030.short_description: A mysterious tale shared with Sujin, the girl only I can see.

4297050.title: VacBot Simulator
4297050.short_description: Have you ever wondered what your robotic vacuum feels when it's wandering through your house? Picking up your messes, leaving your floors pristine again. Wonder no more! Experience the joys of cleaning various houses through the LIDARs of several judgemental robotic vacuums.

4297070.title: Pookie has a Fantasy 3 : Finale
4297070.short_description: A cozy slice-of-life visual novel about love, dreams, and commitment. Support Pookie as she becomes a game developer, face real-life hurdles together, and decide if your relationship is strong enough to lead to marriage and a shared future.

4297110.title: Hopping Out
4297110.short_description: Hopping Out is a tile-based puzzle game where you hop 2 tiles at a time. Play as Frog and use your tongue to move boxes, press buttons to create lily pads, all to catch many flies!

4297170.title: Uncolor
4297170.short_description: Rush through rooms with challenging platforms and terrains, duel with the Color Guardians and claim their hues to your uncolor deeds. Master the precision platformer essentials: WallJump, DoubleJump, SharpTiming. A field day for the SpeedRunners!

4297180.title: Void Combat Disk
4297180.short_description: This is a high-contrast grid-based tactical Roguelike. A unique attachment system synergizes with your 5-slot inventory to create specialized tactics, while adapting to dynamic events each turn is the key to survival. Precisely calculate every point of stamina.

4297240.title: Cellbound
4297240.short_description: Destroy cells, harvest their materials, and research new powers. Cellbound is a short incremental game about breaking down organisms and turning their traits into increasingly powerful upgrades.

4297340.short_description: 3:33 is a visual novel about the conversations we have at 3 AM when a friend reaches out and your alarm will go off in about three hours.

4297390.title: Bammo the Bull
4297390.short_description: Bammo the bull is a 3D single player wave based action game where you battle, upgrade, and smash your way to victory!

4297500.title: Isle Plateau
4297500.short_description: A retro 8/16-bit inspired dark fantasy RPG with an unforgiving, Souls-like difficulty. Survival depends on strategy, knowledge, preparation and resolve.

4297550.title: Idle Muscle Up
4297550.short_description: Ignite your inner beast and lift the heaviest weights in the universe. Grow BIGGER and face rivals who keep getting stronger. Start with a relaxing idle clicker experience to build muscles, then push yourself in challenging arcade-style mini-games.

4297590.title: 99 Lives - Russian Roulette
4297590.short_description: â€œ99 Lives: Russian Roulette is a dark, high-stakes action game. Choose one of six chambers and face three opponents in a deadly gamble. Survive nine levels and 81 rounds where every choice could be your last.â€

4297640.title: Incretyper
4297640.short_description: Incretyper is an incremental typing game where every word you type can trigger powerful effects. Destroy shapes, unlock upgrades and watch your typing power grow into chaotic chain reactions.

4297730.title: ITZO
4297730.short_description: ITZO is a retro style scrolling shooter and bullet hell game where you play as the best (and most ruthless) agent in space: ITZO! You have the mission to prevent an incoming interplanetary conflictâ€¦ How are you going to do it? Easy. With bullets, destruction, chaos and no diplomacy!

4297840.title: Rock Bottom
4297840.short_description: Mine. Smelt. Upgrade. Repeat. Rock Bottom is an incremental mining game where every swing makes you stronger. Descend through 8 unique layers, unlock devastating abilities, and discover what lies at Rock Bottom

4297890.title: PR0B-1E: Expedition Origin

Smash rocks together with a grapple hook, haul them home using a magnetic stasis field and cash in to upgrade your abilities. Solve puzzles and acquire new robotic friends as you explore a mysterious galaxy.

4297900.title: Let There Be Istanbul
4297900.short_description: A hand-drawn slapstick beat-â€™em-up following a father-daughter duo on a wild journey toward Istanbul, with snappy tag-team combat and plenty of cats to pet... but why is Mehmet taking Ebru to Istanbul, and what awaits them there?

4297910.title: Chess Tales
4297910.short_description: Lead your chess army beyond the 8x8 board into a heavily guarded, enchanted fortress, solving environmental puzzles across overgrown gardens, collapsing caves, smelly sewers and trap-filled dungeons until you reach the throne and face the King.

4297980.title: Garden of the Atom
4297980.short_description: Garden of the Atom is a combat-focused Metroidvania where you hold nothing back. Start with every movement ability unlocked and play as 'Prodigy,' an exiled genius infiltrating a futuristic dictatorship to stop a tyrant from harnessing a cataclysmic meteor shower.

4298020.title: The Black Route
4298020.short_description: The contract has you lined up for 10 days driving the Black Rails, make sure the goods arrive. Callers can't resist the train's rumble.

4298070.title: Dying for Parts

4298100.short_description: Awaken alone aboard a drifting colony ship under autonomous lockdown. Restore critical systems, solve interconnected puzzles, and uncover the truth behind the Solari Protocol before you and the colonists depending on you are lost to the void.

4298130.title: Paper Rogue
4298130.short_description: A dark paper-styled dungeon crawler where dice decide your fate. Explore procedural dungeons, fight monsters, loot artifacts, and survive the drop.

4298260.title: A Game About Dodging Balls

Unlike passive survival games, you must master Dash and Hook mechanics to survive relentless mystical hordes. 4298360.short_description: A minimalist incremental clicker about trading stocks and coins in rapid-fire rounds. Watch prices move, square off for profit or loss, and unlock upgrades & sectors

4298380.title: Idle Monkey Theorem

4298400.title: Dystopian Pet Simulator
4298400.short_description: You are a terminal operator in a industrial zone. Your job is simple and dirty: track down mutated creatures, throw a net over them, and deliver your catch to your personal terminal. Each creature brings passive income and experience - the rarer the creature, the faster your economy grows.

4298420.title: Thunder and Line-ing
4298420.short_description: Move lightning through the air to form lines. When everything aligns a boom echoes blasting your score up to a higher strata!

4298500.title: Last Breath æœ€åçš„æ°”æ¯
4298500.short_description: Last Breath is a tense side-scrolling shooter in a fungal-ravaged world, where humanity has become â€œSpore Zombies.â€ As the older sister Guan Jin, fight through the ruins to find your lost sibling. Scavenge, adapt, survive. But what awaits: redemption or a deeper nightmare?

4298710.title: MEHEN
4298710.short_description: MEHEN is a boss-rush game that follows the story of an investigator dispatched to Mehen, a fortress-city where eternal night has fallen. Guard, parry or dodge the starsâ€™ attacks and counter to send the stars back into the night sky.

4298740.title: Mouse Saving Simulator
4298740.short_description: Save tiny mice using your mouse! Guide, push, and carry them through fiery mazes and return them safely to their mothers using precision, timing, and clever movement.

4298750.title: Blob Wars
4298750.short_description: Blob Wars is a turn-based tactics game where efficiency is key. Use each Blobâ€™s unique abilities to defeat the enemy army in as few turns as possible, the fewer turns you take, the greater the reward. Traverse a branching world map and carve your own path through this replayable experience.

4298790.title: SkyDrop
4298790.short_description: Drop into a world where you and your friends can engage in eliminating players, and monsters. There are community trophies to collect all around for you to find but just know that they are not easy to achieve. Good luck out there and have fun.

4298800.title: FORJ
4298800.short_description: Design intricate factories, run a thriving merchant shop, and brave deadly dungeons in a high-stakes co-op extraction loop. Automate your industry with programmable golems, craft legendary +9 gear, and dominate the Arena to unlock 100 levels of permanent prestige power.

4298880.title: Timber Rush
4298880.short_description: Timber Rush is a fast-paced incremental roguelite where every swing explodes into upgrades, chaos, and massive numbers.

4298890.title: Fear Within

Explore familiar spaces through slow-paced exploration, uncover unsettling fragments of the past, and face a growing sense of fear driven by atmosphere and sound.

4299180.title: Deckum Demonium
4299180.short_description: Craft demonic essences and brew powerful potions in this diabolical roguelike deckbuilder. Summon 150+ demons to defend your land against heavenly forces. Discover rare relics and ingredients to form the most potent synergies.

4299220.title: Coinbox Clicker
4299220.short_description: Discover coins, generate cash, and exploit crazy combos in this satisfying incremental game about clicking a box.

4299260.title: Salt & Soul: Pocket Chef's Adventure
4299260.short_description: Awaken as a fragile porcelain salt shaker in a colossal, shadowy kitchen. Guided by your grandmotherâ€™s spirit, retrieve the key ingredient and master manual cooking mechanics to revive lost recipes. In this atmospheric adventure, every jump is a risk, and every dish tells a story.

4299270.title: Cluck And Tag
4299270.short_description: Catch roaming chickens across the map, deliver them, and rack up points! If you aren't Hunter, throw beach balls at rivals to make them drop their loot; if you are Hunter, focus solely on the chase. 4299290.title: ARB: Anomalous Research Bureau - Museum
4299290.short_description: Investigate a mysterious old museum as an agent of the Anomalous Research Bureau. Identify strange anomalies, file accurate reports, and endure the nights until your investigation is completed.

4299510.title: Mr. Nice Guy
4299510.short_description: Play as the Final Girl to outsmart a relentless killer in this PSX style game, inspired by 90s survival horror classics and 80s slasher films. A throwback to the days of crunchy lo-fi visuals, fixed camera angles, tense hiding mechanics, and a variety of puzzles.

4299540.title: CPU Invaders - Movie Attack
4299540.short_description: A sequel to the Steam Awards finalist top-down shooter. Step into classic movie worlds inside your hard drive and become the hero who destroys the alien virus spreading through the digital realm. It has evolved â€” and itâ€™s binge-watching your files.

4299570.title: Capybara Dungeon
4299570.short_description: Capybara Dungeon is a first-person cooperative dungeon exploration game where up to 4 players control capybaras in chaotic runs filled with dangerous creatures, unpredictable traps, and emergent humor, relying on constant communication to survive.

4299630.title: Table Space: Board and Card Game Sandbox
4299630.short_description: The ultimate tabletop games sandbox for mixed reality, designed for Steam Frame and SteamOS. Make and play board games, trading card games, and more with friends on any compatible XR headset. Use the Boxtree Builder to bring your own decks or create entirely new custom game modes.

4299670.title: Remnants: Omision
4299670.short_description: A psychological horror walking simulator powered by Unreal Engine 5. Trapped in a cycle of guilt, explore an oniric bunker and face three entities judging your darkest sin: omission. There are no saves. Can you justify your inaction, or will the remnant consume you?

4299690.title: Keybort
4299690.short_description: Keybort is a clean and fluid idle / clicker game where you progress by pressing keyboard keys.

4299710.title: Undead Apocalypse: The Dawn
4299710.short_description: A high-intensity top-down zombie roguelite focused on massive enemy waves, strategic card-based builds, long-term progression, and devastating synergies as you fight to survive until the first light of dawn.

4299760.title: Socks!
4299760.short_description: Strategic, Satisfying Sock Packing Action! Pair up socks, fresh off the clothesline, in this cute and relaxing physics-based puzzler. Match two socks to roll them up into an adorable bundle and free up space in your sock basket. But don't let your bundle basket overflow either! Pack wisely!

4299820.title: Blackhole Maker
4299820.short_description: Blackhole Maker is a simple, casual game. Pour resources into your flask and merge them together to create ever-larger resources. Upgrade your flask to hold even greater masses, and ultimately strive to create a black hole.

4299860.title: Sad Virus Jungle
4299860.short_description: New part sad virus walking game series. Now collect beer bottles at forest jungle and avoid deathly traps

4299950.title: NinjaCat
4299950.short_description: NinjaCat is a simple thirdâ€‘person 3D action game. You progress through the game using actions such as sword slashing, throwing shuriken, grabbing objects, and jumping. If you manage to solve all the mysteries, youâ€™ll clear the game.

4299980.title: Wicked Boy
4299980.short_description: A nostalgic 2D platformer bursting with Game Boy charm. Combine inventive spells to survive perilous foes, solve clever challenges, and uncover secrets. Lo-fi visuals collide with an epic modern soundtrack, crisp hi-fi SFX and fluid controls, all while keeping the classic spirit of Mario & Mega Man.

4299990.title: Unwilling Host
4299990.short_description: This is a first-person indie horror game with VHS effects. Be carefulâ€”you're facing a terrifying entity.

4300000.title: Donna Survivors
4300000.short_description: A cute and chaotic survivors-like action game set in the world of Donna! Play as lovable characters, combine wild abilities, defeat bosses, and survive hordes of enemies across 6 unique maps.

4300010.title: Pick 'N Punch: The Broken World
4300010.short_description: A punishing physics platformer where every move matters. Climb through a broken world using precise grabs and momentum, uncovering hidden paths. Designed to remind you of your memorable rage moments, but presented in a 2D format.

4300190.title: THE ANOMALY UNIT
4300190.short_description: Forced into working as an Anomaly Observer in a space stockroom, you must explore, observe carefully, and report inconsistencies. Earn Credits to buy upgrades, but beware: hideous horrors are creeping in the dark.

4300210.title: Masackra
4300210.short_description: A tactical game with grid-based combat, classes, and synergies. Assemble your squad, strengthen it through events, and make decisions that determine the outcome of each battle.

4300280.title: Agent C
4300280.short_description: Agent C is the ultimate stealth survivor designed for tactical operations. This innovative character excels in infiltrating military bases, utilizing advanced stealth techniques to navigate through enemy lines undetected with the added capability of piloting a powerful helicopter.

4300320.title: Touhou Mistystory
4300320.genre: Adventure, Indie, RPG, Free To Play
4300320.short_description: A free-to-play, single-player Touhou Project fan-made bullet hell shooter that blends light roguelike elements with modified gameplay mechanics. Defeat your enemies and collect dropped spell cards to enhance your abilities!

4300340.title: The Williams Family Sacrifice
4300340.short_description: Things have been hard for Elizabeth Williams after the tragic death of her husband. She has been doing all she can for her family, but she has been struggling and she's starting to slip. Hopefully she doesn't slip too far...

4300400.title: Adventurers Shop
4300400.short_description: Forge your legacy as both merchant and hero. Explore Zoldar, battle monsters for rare materials, and craft epic gear. Team up with friends to build a thriving shop in the village markets or arm yourselves to conquer the dangerous depths of the wild.

4300410.title: Five Elements Clash Battle
4300410.short_description: A turn-based strategy 3D casual game, based on the traditional Chinese Five Elements, challenges players to strategically move enemies of the same attribute into a straight line to cause them to explode, or lure them into traps of mutually counteracting attributes for elimination.

4300430.title: Assassin Of Spider
4300430.short_description: Play as warrior and try to beat giant spider boss in 7 different levels and find captured skulls in this medieval rpg adventure

4300460.title: é—å¿˜å›å“ Echo of Bark
4300460.short_description: Fur the Shar-Pei, with unfulfilled remorse, enters the broken realm of the regret-stricken, drives a modified RV on its final quest, solves puzzles, uncovers conspiracies, and saves the crumbling world alone with clues and bonds found along the way.

4300530.title: ACTC Racing Simu V3
4300530.short_description: Step into the most brutal touring cars in Argentine motorsport and experience what it truly means to race on the edge. Massive power, unforgiving tracks, and zero room for mistakes. Every corner demands precision. Every braking zone punishes hesitation.

4300740.title: The Final Shuffle
4300740.genre: Action, Adventure, Indie, Massively Multiplayer, RPG, Strategy
4300740.short_description: Earth is dying and one shuttle remains. Scavenge, fight, and manipulate your way to the last seat. Form alliances to survive the chaos, but beware: when the engines ignite, betrayal is the only way out. Trust no one. Board or be left behind.

4300860.title: Food Truck Together
4300860.short_description: Carry grandpa's legacy from Willowbrook to the world. Open world, up to 4 friends. Cook while the truck moves. One drives, one navigates, others at the grill. Bump? Tomatoes fly. Patty burns, driver helpless. One budget, fuel or stock. Someone will spend it without asking.

4300870.title: Gods & Gore
4300870.short_description: Play as a god defending your city in this roguelike tower defense game. Choose the best cards, expand your city, defend with godly powers, and collect mythological creatures to aid you.

4301030.title: Wind Turbines Ocean Meditation
4301030.short_description: Witness the hypnotic rotation of giant wind turbines in the middle of an ocean. This atmospheric simulation offers a unique meditation experience with realistic sounds and dynamic weather conditions. Step away from the stress of the day, clear your mind, and embrace a deep sense of calm and peace.

4301040.title: AshenGaurd
4301040.genre: Adventure, Casual, Indie, RPG, Free To Play
4301040.short_description: AshenGaurd Is a turn-based RPG inspired by all the greats from the past. Journey to regain the memories you lost and save the world from an unknown ancient evil along the way. Explore the world with unique character abilities, play engaging mini games, and unravel the mystery if you can!

4301090.title: Nick's Text Adventure
4301090.short_description: Nickâ€™s Text Adventure is a cruel text-based RPG where everything unfolds one line at a time. Spells lie, gear gets worse, fishing can hurt you, and enemies mock your choices. Nothing is fair, nothing is explained, and the game remembers.

4301120.title: Camp Hollow
4301120.short_description: A first-person survival horror game where you play as a night security guard exploring an abandoned summer camp, solving environmental puzzles, and surviving a relentless creature while trying to escape.

4301190.title: Slither Realm
4301190.short_description: Help the snakes rest without disturbing each other by filling up the available space! Use your analytical skills to solve the puzzle and guide the snakes to their perfect resting spots.

4301200.title: A Tangle of Snakes
