4307390.short_description: A lonely highway. An endless night shift. Pump gas, stock shelves, attend the register, and clean the filth. But be warned: This mundane loop will be shattered by anomalies. You must do your job while dealing with the horror that disrupts your order.

4307580.title: Taco Stand
4307580.short_description: A horror game where you manage a taco stand. Make tacos, serve customers, and get through each night.

4307600.title: How I Learned to Stop Worrying and Love the Kill Line
4307600.short_description: A high-pressure roguelike card game where every choice has a cost â€” just not when it will be paid. Play one card per turn. Push your limits before crossing the Kill Line.

4307620.title: Journey Back to DreamSpace
4307620.short_description: Journey Back to DreamSpace is a quirky top-down, single-player, cyberpunk, adventure game. Interact with angry gangers, crafty corporations and all kinds of strange characters in Port hope. Most of all though, help Jo find a way back to DreamSpace!

4307790.title: GunMan
4307790.short_description: Run your own gun store! In GunMan you have the freedom to manage and customize your store however you like, earn your way forward by buying and selling weapons, spend your earnings on new furniture and store essentials. You have full freedom to move and place furniture and essentials as you please.

4307810.title: å—ç“œç“œå¹¸å­˜è€…Pumpkin Survivor
4307810.short_description: Pumpkin Survivor is a whimsical cartoon-style survival game where youâ€™ll experiment with countless weapon builds to defend against relentless enemy waves. Mix and match abilities, upgrade your pumpkin hero, and survive as long as possible in this roguelike adventure!"

4307880.title: Solar Sandbox
4307880.short_description: Solar Sandbox is a space engine that allow for player to simulate n-body physics in space. Simulate large n-body physics or how would the Earth be effected by you changing it's orbit or how how many Jupiters you need to combine to get a star.

4307950.title: Quantum Era
4307950.short_description: Explore, Fight, Upgrade. Join the roguelite action in third-person, every fight raises alert levels! Conquer outposts, unlock weapons and powerups in an unpredictable procedural environment, get out before the island turns against you!

4308000.title: MILES 27: Look Like You
4308000.short_description: MILES27 is a psychological horror game told through self-contained stories inspired by disturbing real-life cases. Each episode presents a short but intense experience focused on atmosphere and tension. The game is designed to make players feel watched, unsafe, and uncertain about what is real.

4308070.title: NO ENTRY: OUR BURROW
4308070.short_description: NO ENTRY: OUR BURROW is a darkly comedic, survival-focused roguelike tower defense game. You command a group of animals trapped underground, defending a single manhole against endless alien invasions. There is no safe strategy. Only greedâ€”or death.

4308110.title: Your Stepmom
4308110.short_description: <Your Stepmom> is an out of control desktop companion that gives you the immersive experience of being a son of a not so kind stepmom. Embrace the deep and spicy relationship with your stepmom.

4308150.title: Click to win 5000 achievement
4308150.short_description: Rhythmic 2D clicker game with Brazilian funk. Simple clicks, constant progress and powerful music create a dynamic atmosphere, and a large number of achievements motivate you to move on.

4308250.title: T-Drum
4308250.short_description: T-Drum is a puzzle game for making music. Inspired by Tetris and the TR-808, it plays like a super charged block-clearer combined with the audio production power of a drum machine.

4308360.title: HARUKOHARU
4308360.short_description: HARUKOHARU is a puzzle adventure game.But you donâ€™t have to solve the puzzles.

4308620.title: Dirge of Sorrows: A Nation Reborn
4308620.short_description: Build an army and lead a revolution to overthrow a greedy King in a low-fantasy RPG/Strategy auto-battler game. Improve every character's equipment and stats in your army to keep them alive through increasingly difficult battles. Can you survive long enough to seize the throne?

4308630.title: Dopamine rogue
4308630.short_description: Dopamine Rogue is a psychological life-simulation roguelike about surviving your own mind. Confront inner demons, struggle through mental obstacles, and fight to accomplish both basic and extraordinary moments of life. A solo-developed project crafted over two years.

4308920.title: Street Takoyaki
4308920.short_description: Run your very own takoyaki stand in the streets of Japan. Manage your ingredients, pricing, upgrades, and pressure from the police and yakuza in a survival-focused tycoon inspired by some classics.

4308980.title: Rocket Commander VR
4308980.short_description: A Virtual reality game where in you are in control of a weapons platform to protect your buildings from a fierce attack from enemy jets, helicopters and drones. Special features are activated by speaking into your microphone.

4309120.title: Unquiet Grey
4309120.short_description: You can't save him... but what if you could meet him again? Unquiet Grey is a heartbreaking timeloop visual novel about a troubled young woman and the kind-hearted musician she loves through countless lifetimes.

4309130.title: DEFENSORES DEL BARRIO
4309130.short_description: Defenders of the Neighborhood is an arcade game with three mini-games, each following a hero committed to a just cause. From defending a children's shelter to protecting the environment and fighting for public spaces, each hero faces powerful enemies in unique settings.

4309150.title: Memories Loaming
4309150.short_description: Survive the night along a cursed stretch of highway in the remote Labrador wilderness as you investigate the whereabouts of a missing person. If you survive, you'll return again and again until you understand what happened here.

4309330.title: Moonlight Cow: Guardian of the Night
4309330.short_description: A cozy-dark 2D pixel art platformer where a cow and her chick companion explore a moon-broken world and restore the night

4309500.title: Tanks: Total Destruction
4309500.short_description: TANKS Total Destruction is a tribute to a cult classic, reimagined for modern action gaming. A top-down view, movement limited to four directions, and intense, tactical gameplay come together with modern visuals, spectacular explosion effects, and smooth animations powered by Unreal Engine 5.

4309590.title: Fefes
4309590.short_description: Fefes is a card strategy game with roguelike elements. You'll command an army of unusual cats! Unlock all skills from the upgrade tree! Attack, defend, and win again and again!

4309660.title: Giant Enemy Robot Crabs
4309660.short_description: Crush the countless crabs while blasting your way through the cancer zone!

4309740.title: Dash'n'Drops
4309740.short_description: Blast your way through Dash'n'Drops, a platform-fighting inspired roguelite. Build your own moveset, max your stats, and defeat the 7 Eternals!

4312280.title: Is Guilty
4312280.short_description: A psychological horror job simulator. Serve coffee at a lonely drive-thru. But when a mysterious email arrives, your shift changes. Watch the cars. Check the plates. Someone in line is hiding a dark secret, and something else is watching you from the dark.

4312480.title: RP2D Virtual Tabletop
4312480.short_description: RP2D is a 2D virtual tabletop for RPGs. Drop maps, move tokens, reveal fog, layer dynamic weather, stream audio, and keep every session flowing online for GMs and players.

4312540.title: No One's Hero
4312540.short_description: A 2D side-scrolling runner set in ancient times where you play as an unknown messenger racing through danger behind the scenes of a famous legend.

4312600.title: WriteNor
4312600.short_description: WriteNor is a psychological meta-horror where the terminal is your only weapon. Trapped in a corrupted office, you rewrite reality with commands while NORI - a rogue AI - watches your every step.

4312690.title: MMNANA
4312690.short_description: MMNANA is a 3D adventure with 2D pixel art where, after an accident, you must learn to move from scratch and discover whether you can escape an island by crawling using only your hands. Will you uncover the secrets hidden by the islandâ€™s tribe, or will you escape without looking back?

4312770.title: Cozy Frenchie Adventure
4312770.short_description: Embark on a cozy adventure full of discovery! Help an adorable French bulldog carry boxes, move objects, and explore charming maps as he follows clues to reunite with his owner. A cozy, relaxing, and heartwarming game made to enjoy at your own pace.

4312800.title: And No One Was There
4312800.genre: Adventure, Indie, Strategy, Free To Play, Early Access
4312800.short_description: This deeply personal, atmospheric journey leads you through a childhood home now filled with shadows and silence. Exploring and uncovering old diaries, notes, and open meaning evokes melancholy, nostalgia, and reflection on loss, memory, and the bonds that tie us to home.

4312850.title: FISH
4312850.short_description: FISH is a Platformer Run & Gun Shooter where you play as an armed FISH violently exploring through multiple levels. The game features a funny, unique stylized artstyle that could get a chuckle out of you!

4312890.title: DeadEye: A Roguelike Shooter
4312890.short_description: Stop time and master your revolver in this intense 2D roguelike shooter. Face relentless hordes, defeat brutal bosses, forge powerful pacts, and collect artifacts and pets as you fight to survive.

4312900.title: Coastal Summit Sports: College Hockey 26
4312900.short_description: College Hockey 26 is a deep college hockey management simulator where you recruit top prospects, build your roster, and chase national championships.

4312910.title: ARESDA
4312910.short_description: An open-world space exploration game. Explore, trade and fight to rise the ranks, discover new worlds and new species, and leave your mark on the Galaxy.

4313060.title: Ludwig!
4313060.short_description: A top-down shooter featuring a cute pair of furry animals! You start each level with no power - not even a jump! You have to scour the level for pickups to gain ability, and defeat quirky enemies to raise your pan's "seasoning" so that you can become unstoppable! Can be played solo or with a friend.

4313260.title: Piece of Ship
4313260.short_description: A chaotic co-op game about fixing a sinking submarine with duct tape, one wrench, and terrible communication. Fix it together or drown screaming.

4313330.title: Swarmex
4313330.short_description: Swarmex is a casual pixel-art tower defense game where you build and upgrade a modular space base. Place turrets, mine resources with automated miners, and optimise adjacency bonuses as your defences run on their own. Play in short, satisfying sessions.

4313350.title: Fallen Dominion
4313350.short_description: Assemble your ultimate army and survive endless waves in this 3D PvE auto-battler. Combine unique synergies, draft powerful rogue-lite cards, and equip legendary items to defeat massive bosses. Every run offers a new strategy as you develop your squad from fresh recruits into god-like warriors.

4313380.title: The Big Number
4313380.short_description: The Big Number is a strategic incremental idle clicker where you breach 7 massive firewalls to reach infinity. Start from zero and build your way to unimaginable numbers through tactical resource management, automated systems, and strategic progression.

4313410.title: Nothing
4313410.short_description: ã€ŠNothingã€‹ is a story-driven role-playing game where you play as a female protagonist exploring a mysterious otherworld. Through walking, observation, and dialogue, you will gradually piece together the secrets of the worldâ€”and your own place within it.

4313450.title: STREET TYPER X
4313450.short_description: A typing fighting game? â€œSTREET TYPER Xâ€ is a PvP online typing fighting game where every action is done by typing. Type â€œforwardâ€ to move, â€œpunchâ€ to attack. Forget â€œâ†“â†˜â†’+Pâ€. Outspeed with typing, outplay with fighting skills, and win!

4313530.title: å¤©ä½¿æˆ¦äº‰ Angels' War
4313530.short_description: Our angel Amane Kanata soars the sky in this short "souls-like" action game.

4313580.title: Scars of the Soul
4313580.short_description: The two countries went to war, unleashing forbidden powers. Years later, monsters ravage the land. The protagonist awakens, battles the monsters, explores the world, uncovers the truth of the past, and seeks to recover lost memoriesâ€”a lonely journey of wandering and struggling against oneself.

4313610.title: Chopping TogetherğŸŒ²
4313610.short_description: A 1-4 player co-op, You are stuck in a forest alone or together with one goal to chop every tree in sight. Chop Trees, Gather Wood, Make Money And Upgrade Your Tools

4313730.title: Fishful Days
4313730.short_description: Personally manage miniature aquariums in this tranquil idle sim. Unlock themed tanks and breed unique fish to witness their growth from fry to magnificent adults. Use strategic combinations to trigger powerful synergies. Build your own shimmering underwater oasis today.

4313790.title: CM-SS13
4313790.genre: Action, RPG, Simulation, Free To Play
4313790.short_description: The year is 2182, but the engine is from 2003. Join the Falling Falcons in a massive tactical deathmatch RP fest held together by spaghetti code and duct tape. Build bases, perform surgery, or evolve as the Hive. It's laggy, it's complex, and it is the most fun you will have dying in space.

4313830.title: å¼‚ç•Œä»™è¸ªImmortal Sword
4313830.short_description: Immortal Sword is a strategy and role-playing game that combines tower defense, tower pushing, and lightweight rouge. You will defeat various strong enemies in the world of swords and magic, gradually regaining your power.

4313860.title: Psychiatric: Containment
4313860.short_description: Face the paranormal in this survival horror experience. Monitor security cameras, identify hostile entities using professional equipment, and maintain control of an abandoned psychiatric hospital before your sanity collapses.

4313870.title: Surprisingly Fine 2: Wind / Wave
4313870.short_description: RoRoKaii Worksâ€™ Debut: A cozy idle game focused on collecting. No complex strategiesâ€”just watch numbers grow as you hone 15 unique skills. With the Mastery System, collect any item 100 times to gain bonus EXP and fuel your journey toward perfection.

4313930.title: Crime City Center
4313930.short_description: Unarmed Criminals try to complete illegal missions by blending in with NPCs, while the Police hunt them down with limited ammo and radars. Watch out: Criminals must stay hidden, while the Police must make every shot count. If the Police run out of ammo, they lose the game! This is Crime City!

4314000.title: Dark Leaches
4314000.short_description: A first-person horror paranormal game. Solve puzzles and unlock items to help you overcome your fear of the dark. The art style is generally realistic, and some mild graphic horror is implemented.

4314010.title: Command by Voice: World Conquest
4314010.short_description: Rule a nation by issuing voice or text commands to an AI and conquer the world. Voice input supports Chinese and English; text input supports all languages.

4314060.title: PuzzMaoã€œPuzzle and Magical Overlordã€œ
4314060.short_description: Heartwarming Fantasy Ã— Falling-Block Puzzle Game PuzzMaoï½Puzzle and Magical Overlordï½ is a falling-block puzzle game set in a fantasy world where you battle for the throne of Demon Lord! Defeat the advancing enemies with simple rules and exhilarating puzzles!

4314260.title: A Game About Making A Planet
4314260.short_description: A Game About Making A Planet is a short incremental auto clicker game. Make a planet by merging particles together.

4314280.title: Faehnor Online
4314280.genre: Action, Adventure, Massively Multiplayer, RPG, Free To Play, Early Access
4314280.short_description: A handcrafted MMORPG developed by a solo creator, where exploration relies on real paper maps. Get lost, find your way, and set out to conquer a world that will never take you by the hand.

4314290.title: Almost Home
4314290.short_description: A tense online co-op horror experience where teamwork is your only lifeline. Every session plays out differently as you explore shifting environments, manage fear and resources, and survive unpredictable threats together.

4314350.title: Silk and Sabre
4314350.short_description: Shipwrecked with a haughty Chinese noble, Pirate Captain Jack finds that survival is a very naked business. ğŸ´â€â˜ ï¸ Abandon honour for heat in Silk and Sabre! ğŸŒ´ Explore exotic taboos, raw desire, and explicit encounters where East meets West in the most intimate ways. ğŸŒŠğŸ”¥ğŸ’¦ Your prize awaits

4314440.title: Fusil
4314440.short_description: An action-adventure set in a weird fantasy world. Face levels where every shot counts: move silently to backstab enemies, use spells to unlock paths, and explore non-linear environments with multiple solutions. Choose your path, manage your ammo, and survive.

4314500.title: Waste Runner: Critical Waste
4314500.short_description: Step into the role of a city garbage collector and face the hidden dangers lurking in the streets. Viewed from a top-down, isometric perspective, the game challenges you to collect, transport, and safely dispose of waste across multiple urban neighbourhoods.

4314520.title: DepotDash
4314520.short_description: Fast-paced top-down construction yard simulator where you manage deliveries, move materials with heavy machines, and keep suppliers happy before your depot overflows.

4314550.title: Spacetime Shooter
4314550.short_description: You are a sniper who controls time and space. Eliminate all enemies with a single bullet.

4314560.title: Cartapli : Fold Quest
4314560.genre: Casual, Indie, RPG, Strategy, Free To Play
4314560.short_description: Cartapli: fold Quest is a turn-based combat game combining strategy roguelike mechanics with unique origami puzzles. Fold the paper to shift positions and defeat all enemies!

4314800.title: Rise of the Insurged
4314800.short_description: Rise of the Insurged is a dark fantasy strategy/management game where you lead a company of adventurers. Recruit, train, and send your mercenaries on choice-driven missions, fight in the arena, and master craftable elemental magic to overthrow the Queen.

4315020.title: Ripped From Time: Outpost
4315020.short_description: First-person drone combat meets RTS base-building: command historical squads, advance from stone to lasers, and power the outpostâ€™s defenses and superweapon to seal a space-time rupture.

4315080.title: Indie Hoverboard Racing
4315080.short_description: A high-speed sci-fi hoverboard racer. Survive hostile regions, defeat elite rivals, and earn your place on the Nocturnia City Circuit.

4315100.title: Last $50
4315100.short_description: Build a drug empire with your last $50. Buy production, upgrade it, and hire workers to automate.

4315130.title: ë‚˜ì˜ ì²« ëŒì”ì¹˜(MyFirstBirthday)
4315130.genre: Action, Adventure, Casual, Indie, Free To Play
4315130.short_description: ë‚˜ì˜ ì²« ëŒì”ì¹˜ëŠ” ì´ì œ ë§‰ í•œ ì‚´ì´ ëœ ì•„ê¸°ê°€ì—„ë§ˆ ì•„ë¹ ì˜ ë„ì›€ ì—†ì´ í˜¼ìì„œ ìì‹ ì˜ ì²« ëŒì”ì¹˜ë¥¼ ì¤€ë¹„í•˜ëŠ” ê³¼ì •ì„ ê·¸ë¦°ì§§ê³  ë”°ëœ»í•œ ìŠ¤í† ë¦¬ ì¤‘ì‹¬ ì¸ë”” ê²Œì„ì…ë‹ˆë‹¤. My First Birthday is a short, story-driven indie game where you play as a one-year-old baby who sets out to prepare her own first birthday partyâ€”without help from mom and dad.

4315140.title: Mini Magic Match
4315140.short_description: Welcome to this joyful magical world. Here, you'll find a rainbow of candies, jellies, and chocolates. Match, eliminate, and collect them all. Additionally, you can utilize various power-ups, such as bombs, to eliminate even more.

4315150.title: Wildwake
4315150.short_description: Wildwake is an adventure game where every decision affects your body, mind, and chances of staying alive. Dive into a tense narrative and test your real survival knowledge along the way.

4315200.title: CosmicSurvivor
4315200.short_description: Mow down countless waves of aliens! "Ginga Tensei Cosmic Survivor" is a Bishojo Roguelite Survival Action game. Combine weapons and items to evolve them into powerful "Artifacts"! Search for your missing comrade and challenge the cosmic threat, the "Parasitic Lifeforms," to a decisive battle.

4315220.title: Immunica
4315220.short_description: Fight, upgrade, and survive against the pathogens invading your body.

4315240.title: Cloud
4315240.genre: Casual, Indie, Simulation, Free To Play
4315240.short_description: Cloud is a short, relaxing experience where you guide a cloud across the sea, absorb moisture, and bring rain to help plants grow as you drift between islands.

4315280.title: School Quest
4315280.short_description: A retro point-and-click adventure set in a 1980s high school, where a wisecracking teen investigates a missing friend, dodges bullies, and uncovers a bizarre conspiracy lurking in the halls.

4315300.title: Hopping Ninja-san
4315300.short_description: Hop your way to the goal as Hopping Ninja-san! A high-difficulty game with simple controls â€” just be careful not to hit your head.

4315550.title: The Carcass
4315550.short_description: A deep roguelike colony RPG inside a dead god's corpse. Procedurally generated events, branching narratives, species with unique traits, and meaningful choices that shape your colony's fate. Every playthrough tells a different story of survival and evolution.

4315560.title: Sex Queen
4315560.short_description: Sex Queen is a candid visual novel for adults. An ordinary audience with the queen turns into a night where duty and desire intertwine in a dangerous game. At stake is not only the salvation of the city, but also who the hero will become after this meeting.

4315690.title: Ashes of Kardoria
4315690.short_description: A dark choice-driven RPG where moral decisions shape your path. Face a brutal island torn by plague, hunger, and a growing orc threat. Pick a faction, hone your skills, battle unique bosses, and fight for a future worth paying for.

4315730.title: Rock Bottom
4315730.short_description: Run. Jump. Run some more. Never look back. In Rock Bottom, you're just one mistake away from being crushed by a massive massive boulder. You must jump ... but jump wisely.

4315850.title: ç™½æ „å¤§å­¦ã€€0å·é¤¨
4315850.short_description: Hakuei University, Paranormal Research Club. As a second-year student, I investigate haunted spots and write articles. My next assignment is Building No. 0, a campus location rumored to be untouchable. Soon, events beyond the rumors begin to unfold. This place should never have been investigated.

4315910.title: Only One
4315910.short_description: Pick up a magic sword on the ancient pillar of sacrifice and fight to become the 'Only One' left standing. Wishlist to follow updates and get notified at launch

4315950.title: Mars Colony Simulator
4315950.short_description: Build humanityâ€™s first home on Mars. Mine resources in first person, construct life-sustaining domes, grow lush vegetation, and launch rockets to reconnect with Earth in this immersive colony-building simulator.

4316020.title: A talk beneath the tree
4316020.short_description: Can a Mage live free, when Magic can only come from Demons? Sylvain thinks so, but when he flees the Alchemical Institute, his old friend Celeste can't help but think things are about to take a turn for the worse. One conversation will set the course of their lives. Guide them through it.

4316030.title: Age of Failon - Birth of the Hero
4316030.short_description: Age of Failon is a turn-based fantasy strategy game where players control heroes exploring a world map, gathering resources, building up castle with unique creature dwellings, recruiting armies, casting spells, and battling enemy heroes and monsters.

4316140.title: Nightfall Berlin
4316140.short_description: Nightfall Berlin is an occult detective RPG with a focus on exploration, case-solving and our relationship to the places where we live and die, set in the dynamic, seductive and violent history of 90s Berlin.

4316280.title: APPLECALYPSE
4316280.short_description: Point and click about apples, featuring real photos as backgrounds, with gameplay sections inspired by billiardsÂ and a Lynchian story about a -paranormal?- event taking place in a small town, psychologically and physically transforming the neighborhoodâ€™s residents.

4316330.title: Meow Survivors
4316330.short_description: A casual top-down game with simplified roguelike elements, where a ginger cat named Meow battles endless waves of enemies. Gain experience, upgrade your skills, find the most effective combination of abilities, and try to survive as long as possible.

4316390.title: Safehaven
4316390.short_description: SAFEHAVEN is a psychological survival horror game about life in a bunker, mysterious guests, and choices that carry real consequences.

4316470.title: QWERTING
4316470.short_description: Unfinished horror games by missing developers. A diary written from inside the code. Fragments that decay in real time. Your keyboard is a weapon. Hesitation is deadly.

4316720.title: Andy Runner
4316720.short_description: An endless-runner with racing in it type of game.

4316750.title: Roadside Reseal
4316750.short_description: A roadside store where the night never feels safe. Flickering lights, endless aisles, whispers from the dark. Each task feels like research into fearâ€”you restock, you lock, you fight to keep the seal closed.The silence breaks, the air is heavy, and every moment is research into survival.

4316760.title: Set In Stone
4316760.genre: Action, Adventure, Indie, Free To Play
4316760.short_description: Play with friends. Use big rock. Guard fire. Get sap. Big sap fuel fire. Go out, find plant. Plant guard fire. Evolve. Get tools. Set in Stone is a Co-op survival wave shooter about defending your bonfire from waves of dinosaurs. Do you and your friends have what it takes to survive?

4316830.title: Evergain Adventure
4316830.short_description: A fast paced 2D roguelite where swords, bows, and daggers define your playstyle across replayable, procedurally generated runs. Travel through 3 distinct biomes, defeat enemies, collect rewards and become stronger.

4316920.title: Beneath the Snow Veil
4316920.short_description: "Beneath the Snow Veil" is an exploration survival game set in a frigid, post-apocalyptic world. Amid extreme weather and deadly cold, explore ruins, craft tools, repair and upgrade your shelter to withstand freezing temperatures, hunger, and lurking threats.

4316960.title: Spirit-Sealing Tome
4316960.genre: Action, Adventure, Massively Multiplayer, RPG, Free To Play
4316960.short_description: A classic xianxia RPG featuring breathtaking celestial landscapes and legendary sword fights. Choose your immortal clan, master divine skills, ride mythical swords to fly, and unlock hidden realms. With stunning character designs and HD effects, itâ€™s your gateway to a spellbinding immortal world!

4316970.title: Darkrite: The Blight of Love
4316970.short_description: Old school, rich with lore, and made with love. Experience a linear gothic story with carefully handwritten prose. Play either as an action RPG or visual novel. Your Weaver journey starts here.

4317040.title: Alone After Dark: Head Practitioner
4317040.short_description: Attend to patients and fill out paperwork as 22-year-old Kimora Jackson on her first shift after graduating nursing school. Draw blood, administer medications, and try not to lose your head in the chilling hallways of Coldrock Medical Center.

4317370.title: Learn Japanese or... Die!
4317370.short_description: A first-person horror game where you must learn Japanese or... Polly Glot, the crazy language learning app mascot will kill you!

4317450.title: Little Girls Dreamventures
4317450.short_description: Go Mind World and save neighbor! A new retro styled ARPG! Venture into a strange dream world, defeat four Guardians, and save your neighbor, Xian, from her nightmares! So, are you ready for an adventure?

4317460.title: Bel's Fanfare
4317460.short_description: Bel's Fanfare is an RPG with rich deep exploration and expressive combat. You play as Bel, the new aura cleaner of the once-luxurious vessel The Witch of the Sea.

4317500.title: Cat in Temple
4317500.short_description: On a quiet night, a lone cat wanders into an old temple and suddenly finds itself unable to leave. The same night repeats over and over, trapping the cat in an endless loop. Within the temple grounds, time twists unnaturally, and strange yokai and eerie anomalies appear and vanish like shadows.

4317600.title: Red Exit Is A Lie
4317600.short_description: A fun and casual anomaly-detection game where you must spot the differences in looping environments through hand-crafted cartoon worlds. Follow the rules: red exit for anomalies, green exit for normal. But what if the rules themselves are the real trap?

4317670.title: Medieval Battle: Food Truck
4317670.short_description: Medieval Battle: Food Truck is a roguelike cooking game where your food truck is just as vital as the battlefield, and burger flipping can be more important than swinging swords. Every meal you serve directly strengthens your army, and the quality of your cooking can decide the fate of the war.

4317900.title: Infinite Ruins
4317900.short_description: An incremental mining game where you manage golems, destroy blocks, unlock upgrades, and descend infinitely in search of ever more valuable resources.

4317970.title: Lugubrious
4317970.short_description: This is a shooting game focused on urban nighttime defense.

4317980.title: Sesquipedalian
4317980.short_description: This is a casual puzzle game centered around the core gameplay of "time-limited item-catching challenges".

4318020.title: Mystery Company
4318020.short_description: Unmask villains across Crescentland in this detective idle game. Build your agency, upgrade your van, run food franchises, excavate underground riches, and uncover the conspiracy behind NEXUS Industries. Gather clues. Expose the truth. Mystery never sleeps.

4318030.title: Lovely Anime Puzzle: Summer
4318030.short_description: Lovely Anime Puzzle: Summer is a fun and rewarding puzzle game. Assemble charming beach-themed pictures, sharpen your attention, and immerse yourself in a festive holiday world.

4318050.title: A Mystic Journey With : Zephyr
4318050.short_description: Embark on a titillating journey through mystical realms with Zephyr, your alluring guide. This adults-only "spot the differences" game challenges your keen eye while rewarding your success with seductive reveals.

4318240.title: Pinball Trimball - First Mission
4318240.short_description: Pinball game with clean retro sci-fi design.

4318330.title: Brace for Dolphins!
4318330.short_description: A fast-paced 2D top-down roguelite strategy game where you command a shifting galactic warfront. Fight real-time battles on contested planets to prevent an advanced dolphin empire from conquering the galaxy. Race to out-build and out-gun your enemy before it's too late.

4318370.title: MAZY
4318370.short_description: MAZY is a first-person PS1-style horror game where you explore procedurally generated mazes, solve a variety of minigames and survive while hostile clowns hunt you down. Collect coins to buy power-ups and assistance to help you escape.

4319020.title: Black Sword
4319020.short_description: Black Sword is a narrative-driven light RPG set in a dark fantasy world. Play as a lone knight on pilgrimage to plague-cursed Canterbury. Features turn-based combat, dice-roll skill checks, tactical targeting, vampiric abilities, exploration, and choice-driven storytelling.

4319090.title: Lantern Fish
4319090.short_description: Bring light to the deepest depths of the ocean to save the world from an impending darkness. Traverse to the ocean floor, saving desperate creatures, rescuing mermaids, liberating ancient kingdoms, and thwarting world-ending cults. Become the Lantern Fish in this whimsical 2D hand-drawn adventure!

4319170.title: SunWars
4319170.short_description: Sun Wars is a real-time strategy game set in a galactic war between suns. Build and boost your solar system, attack enemy suns, avoid deadly black holes, and manage energy wisely. Only smart tactics and strategy will let you survive and win the war.

4319190.title: Frayline
4319190.short_description: Frayline is a bullet hell RPG where you draw elements and spell shapes to cast magic, dodge relentless attacks, level up your wizard, and descend deeper into a deadly dungeon.

4319210.title: Dune Rancher
4319210.short_description: Dune Rancher is a first-person incremental Moondust collecting game where you hoard materials and keep them safe from stealing Desert Spirits. Use Moondust to buy weapons, tools and robots to boost and automate your income.

4319290.title: Void Cargo: Equilibrium
4319290.short_description: Physics-based space trucking sandbox where you fly delivery routes, balance thrust and fuel, repair systems mid-flight, and take on higher-risk jobs for bigger payouts.

4319390.title: Resort Simulator
4319390.short_description: Run and manage a seaside resort! Take care of guests and handle daily operations. Grow your resort step by step, create the perfect vacation atmosphere, and enjoy a calming simulation experience.

4319430.title: JAYWALK: An Endless Arcade Hopper Game
4319430.short_description: Hop, dodge, and race to the top in this endless runner inspired by Frogger! Collect coins, unlock new characters, and compete with friends in fast-paced multiplayer chaos.

4319520.title: Turbo Ziggurat
4319520.short_description: A pvp, team based stealth game. Infiltrate the Ziggurat and steal the precious lapuli, exfiltrate it in the city but beware of the other teams.

4319860.title: Resonant
4319860.short_description: Transcend bodies, time, and worlds. In this narrative hybrid of Point & Click Adventure and 2D Platformer, you are a formless Traveler. Shift between post-apocalyptic ruins and neon cyberpunk cities. Solve puzzles, master platforming challenges, and unravel the nature of consciousness.

4319910.title: Campfire: Night One
4319910.short_description: Sarah wakes up alone in the shadow of the cursed Lockwood Castle. What began as a friendly prank turns into a bloody fight for survival in the Abanda wilderness. On this night, the ultimate question remains: do monsters walk among us, or do they live within us?

4320070.title: è›Šé“The Reverend's Path
4320070.short_description: The Reverend's Pathis a rogue-lite game where players craft killer moves using Gu insects, within a combat system of Sea of Consciousness, Thought, Dao Marks, Body, Energy, battlefield, space, and time.

4320190.title: Your Grandma
4320190.short_description: Grandma will always stay with you and watch over you.If youâ€™re tired, itâ€™s okay to take a break.Iâ€™ll be right here on your desktop.

4320280.title: Crystal Garden
4320280.short_description: A classic-style match-3 puzzle experience with a soothing garden theme. Easy to play, rewarding to master, and perfect for short sessions or long, relaxing play.

4320290.title: Desktop Farm Story
4320290.short_description: "Desktop Farm Tale" is a lightweight desktop farming sim. No window-switching neededâ€”your farm stays on desktop! Plant crops, feed pets, harvest resources and unlock decorations to style your cozy nook in spare time. Zero grind, just warm vibes for your screen.

4325020.title: Space Thrusters
4325020.short_description: Space Thrusters is a physics puzzle game where you plan the perfect route through enemy ship vents. Guide a bomb through tight spaces to trigger satisfying, cinematic explosions! The stakes are high: you must visualize your exit before you enter. Unravel the secrets of space-one detonation at a time

4325060.title: Lucky's Funhouse
4325060.short_description: You must stay alive in this horror/puzzle adventure. Do your best to survive the monsters of the funhouse and uncover the mystery behind them. Multiple endings. Will you partake in the madness, or find a way out. She is coming.

4325090.title: Snafubar
4325090.short_description: Design your kit with powerful spells, weapons, and gear to explode, slice, and overwhelm your opponents in this tactical 3v3 team arena fighter with destructible terrain - which is floating in the void, so don't fall!

4325450.short_description: Awakened 200 years after death in an abandoned underground facility, mortal enemies Renzye and Kinsae find themselves trapped together in one body. Seeking answers and a way out, they must put aside their ancient rivalry and combine their unique abilities in this fast-paced, precision platformer.

4325460.short_description: Tear through the decaying Earth as a mutant half-worm in this arcade inspired rail shooter! Branching paths, fast-paced gameplay, and lots of gore: this grotesque mass is a blood smeared love letter to the classics of old.

4325500.title: Pop Optics
4325500.short_description: Pop Optics is a trippy throwback bullet-hell where you will run around avoiding teardrops, explosions, and lasers that you yourself are controlling! The laser-firing eyeballs focus on your cursor while you navigate the game board.

4325570.title: DungeonManagerAgent
4325570.short_description: There have been a lot of burglaries recently... I can't keep up with them, so can someone help me defeat the intruders? Auto-battle defense game

4325670.title: Shredder Judgement
4325670.short_description: Spirited away by a demon? You have been taken by a demon. He demands that you throw away his documents. Use the shredder to clear the paperwork efficiently. Do so, and perhaps the demon will be satisfied. But if you cannot...

4325740.title: Lawnmower game Ufo Chase 2
4325740.short_description: Sequel lawnmower ufo chase game. Enemy UFO with several weapons like rockets and laser are chasing Lawnmower guy. Cut enough grass and earn stars to unlock new levels and avoid UFO and beware other objects

4325780.title: The Rebornor
4325780.short_description: A casual and simple reincarnation game. You are granted the qualification for infinite rebirthsâ€”each new life can be a brand-new script, allowing you to become a writer, a swordsman, a merchant...Continuously complete lives, accumulate points, purchase items, and take on even more challenging lives!

4325790.title: Ocean Otter Swim
4325790.short_description: Ocean Otter Swim is a 3D top-down swimming game about making your way back to the sea. Letâ€™s swim with a CUTE SEA OTTER!

4325970.title: Verdict of Desire
4325970.short_description: Verdict of Desire is a candid visual novel for adults. A routine hearing on a speeding case in a small town court turns into a story of forbidden passion and a sudden explosion of desire between the judge and the defendant.

4326010.title: Color Splash: Reptiles
4326010.short_description: Color Splash: Reptiles is a charming and relaxing puzzle game that will lift your spirits and take You into the world of adorable reptiles and art. Venture into the gallery, where you will find many extraordinary and colorful birds paintings.

4326570.title: Idle Crops
4326570.short_description: Plant, grow and harvest vegetables on your own taskbar farmÂ while gaming, working or doing whatever you're doing at the moment. No need to think big or manage complicated processes, just some relaxing idle farming.

4326740.title: Node Crown
4326740.short_description: Node Crown is a roguelite focused on building a node-based kingdom. Quick runs designed for replayability, deep synergies, hundreds of nodes, and builds that make every run unique - you will find it here! Have fun!

4326790.title: Silliards
4326790.genre: Action, Adventure, Casual, Indie, Simulation, Free To Play
4326790.short_description: A 3D physics-based game where you must explore a variety of absurd levels through the mindâ€™s eye of a budding billiards monk. Do you have what it takes to reach Billiards Nirvana?

4327100.title: Hentai Fluffy Wolf Camp!!
4327100.short_description: A fluffy, kawaii wolf appeared!! The excited wolf lunges at you, caught off guard!! Smoothly animated CG events , with voice acting!!

4327380.title: Exit Lust
4327380.short_description: You are trapped in an endless underground passageway. Observe your surroundings carefully to reach "EXIT LUST".

4327400.title: Sushi Sewers
4327400.short_description: A fast-paced cyberpunk bullet-heaven where neon chaos, dark power, and endless enemy swarms collide. Survive the waves, create the strongest builds, and become unstoppable.

4327510.title: Odd Dice
4327510.short_description: A luck-based game where every dice roll could make you richâ€”or ruin you. Manipulate odds, bend probability, and survive against an odd dice.

4327550.title: é­”é¾™ä¼ è¯´

4327550.short_description: Dragon Legend is a cartoon-style casual match-3 adventure game. Centered around the core gameplay of "arrow tile matching + rescue levels," it pairs character customization and collection elements to create a relaxing, stress-relieving level-clearing experience.

4327720.title: Battle for Asciion
4327720.short_description: Battle for Asciion is a classic horizontal shoot â€™em up built entirely from real text characters. No sprites. No pixels. No images. Just pure ASCII action, massive bosses, weapon upgrades and retro arcade challenge.

4328210.title: Slime City: Trials
4328210.short_description: Slime City: Trials is a movement shooter where slime removes friction, and momentum is everything. Splat enemies to paint slippery paths, slide into popping slimes for speed boosts, and race the clock to earn the best medals.

4328670.title: Bump Guardian
4328670.short_description: Bump Guardian is a casual deck-building defense game about protecting a growing life. Build your deck, repel incoming threats, and progress through the stages of pregnancy.

4328890.title: Duck the Police
4328890.short_description: Welcome to Duck Angeles. Youâ€™re a corrupt cop money talks, and the lawâ€¦ floats. Take bribes, make choices, and survive in a criminal city of ducks.

4329080.title: Gun Repair Shop
4329080.short_description: Become a master gunsmith. Repair, restore, customize, and test firearms in a detailed workshop simulator: buy parts, craft components, renovate classic weapons, and take them to the shooting range to prove your work

4329160.title: Critical Descent
4329160.short_description: Master the hardcore, Starship-style catch maneuver in Critical Descent. Pilot massive boosters and agile upper stages across 50+ handcrafted levels on Earth, the Moon, and Mars. Featuring global leaderboards, multiple difficulties, and a realistic physics system, for the ultimate landing experience.

4329200.title: Cube Grinder Factory
4329200.short_description: Dismantle, sort, and build cube structures in this first-person work simulator. A progression spiral with advanced tools takes you from simple worker to mastering the cube world. Explore mysterious factory rooms and discover the secret of the Cube Grinder Factory.

4294490.title: KOTAMON: My Sis Found A Super-Rare Card In Her Cereal Box, So I Became A Garbage Man To Find The Entire Collection And Earn $1,000,000
4294490.short_description: Clearing trash can feel even better when you not only make the world cleaner, but also find extra-rare cards that have suddenly increased in price! Rummage through garbage, fulfill the orders from the dump site owner, look for hidden treasures... and collect all the KotÃ¡mons!

4294540.title: Empire Reunited
4294540.short_description: Crawl through spaces you were not meant to see, make every move count, uncover a secret history, unite with age-old enemies, and claim power before power claims you in this challenging dungeon-crawler JRPG.

4294950.title: Baby Lemonade
4294950.short_description: A non-linear surrealist adventure about a man trapped in his dreams while a company wants to buy them for broadcast. An immersive, open-ended exploration between psychedelic dreamlands and fragmented realities, where you can follow various bizzare objectives, find hidden paths, or try to wake up!

4295060.title: Don't Miss The Button
4295060.short_description: Don't Miss The Button is a fast-paced clicker game where every click counts. Earn money, upgrade your stats, boost hit chance and combos, and watch the numbers grow. Each run resets, but Steam achievements track your progress. Simple, relaxing, and perfect for short sessions.

4295090.title: Horses of Gavarnie
4295090.short_description: Horses of Gavarnie is set in a fantasy world inspired by the Pyrenees, you must care for your horses, build a community, and adapt to industrialization. Discover and create new horse breeds, lead a second horse by your side as you ride, and help both horses and humans find their perfect match.

4295120.title: s[TOR-Y]telling
4295120.short_description: Release your creativity in a local generative AI sandbox where every interaction matters. Evaluate sentient s[TOR-Y]s to shape a cinematic Visual Novel. Featuring 50 built-in stories and custom creation support, s[TOR-Y]telling is an infinite narrative experiment. How far are you going to test it?

4295190.title: The Velan Reach - Book One: An Unbroken Line
4295190.short_description: An adult steampunk Visual Novel where you take on the role of a scientist joining a mission of discovery and wonder. Travel to strange new worlds and get to know your traveling companions (quite intimately so in some cases).

4295240.title: Neon Vice Club Simulator
4295240.short_description: Manage, design, upgrade, and expand your own nightclub in a neon-lit open world. Shape your club with staff management, income systems, and reputation mechanics; make the right moves to create the cityâ€™s hottest venue.

4295400.title: Furry and the Beast
4295400.short_description: A dark gothic fantasy visual novel where a wolf hunter tracks a seductive shapeshifter through moonlit forests, only to discover that both hunter and prey are capable of becoming something far more dangerous.

4295570.short_description: Turn-based card game. Raise the bar on the best poker hands you think are present out of all players' cards. Since you can only see your cards, you'll have to take a chance on the cards other players have or lie about your own cards. Bullshit or be bullshit-ed.

4295810.title: A Whisper of Fall: Jinyiwei
4295810.short_description: "A Whisper of Fall: Jinyiwei" is an ARPG set in the Ming Dynasty. Play as a Jinyiwei (Imperial Guard) with martial art, lightness skill and the unique deduction ability, across shifting timelines and sandbox levels to weave the destiny of yourself and the dynasty.

4295940.title: Dungeon Pit
4295940.short_description: Fight. Die. Upgrade. Repeat. A dark fantasy incremental bullet hell idle arena about blood, gold, and heroes. Numbers go brrr.

4296220.title: Trailer Game
4296220.short_description: Reversing a trailer is tough in real life, this game takes the challenge to the extreme. Traverse tight corners, uneven terrain and narrow bridges in this ultimate test of skill and determination.

4296250.title: I WAS A KING
4296250.short_description: A court-driven, text-based strategy game where your words become decrees. Two petitions per turnâ€”type carefully, face the backlash, and remember: you WERE a King.

4296290.title: Records of Searching for Gods in Mountains and Seas

4296310.title: Green Button
4296310.short_description: The story of a man trapped in circumstances with no obvious way out. A psychological horror in which danger is always near, and the only chance for salvation is to make an extraordinary decision. Will you be able to get out without losing yourself â€” or will the price of salvation be too high?..

4296400.title: Lumen survive the dark
4296400.short_description: Lumen: Survive the Dark is a dark, atmospheric action roguelike where you fight relentless enemies, survive deadly encounters, and push deeper into the unknown. Master combat, adapt to chaos, and endure a world that grows more hostile every run.

4296520.title: STEEL HEAVEN
4296520.short_description: STEEL HEAVEN is a high-octane FPS horde survival roguelite. Combine ultra-fluid mobility with devastating melee combat and rogue-lite progression. Master wall-running and dashing while tearing through thousands of enemies. Survive for 30 minutes in a world that evolves with every kill.

4296570.title: Never Secure
4296570.short_description: A dark survival management game where you guide a small group of people through daily life in a collapsing world, making difficult choices to keep them alive one more day.

4296790.title: ç¬¬ä¸€æ¬¡å½“å¦ˆå¦ˆ
4296790.short_description: First Time Mom is a female-oriented simulation game that includes career development, raising a daughter, and managing a family. Players will progress from being an online writer to a director, accompany their daughter until she turns 18, and enjoy sweet interactions with her husband.

4296930.title: European Logistics Tycoon
4296930.short_description: Build your own logistics company, plan deliveries across European cities, and manage vehicles, drivers, and costs. Accept contracts, optimize routes, and make smart business decisions to grow your company step by step.

4297040.title: Aeternum Infecti
4297040.short_description: Aethernum Infecti is a third-person, open-world survival game set in a haunting post-apocalyptic world. Scavenge cities and wilderness for food, medicine, and weapons while evading relentless infected. Explore a vast, desolate land where silence is deadly and survival is everything.

4297130.title: Worst Wifey (ãƒ¯ãƒ«å«)
4297130.short_description: Feeling like your desktop is a little too lonely? A cute desktop companion baddie to keep you company and brighten your screen. with EXTRA PHYSICS!

4297710.short_description: Interstitial is a first-person psychological horror game that dives into the unease of liminal spaces, blending environmental storytelling, exploration-driven gameplay, and slow-burning dread to create an experience where the world itself becomes the threat.

4297760.title: Take a Hint
4297760.genre: Indie, RPG, Simulation, Free To Play
4297760.short_description: Take a Hint! is a comic-style visual novel where you control Delfina and must convince your best friend AilÃ©n that her boyfriend is not good for her. It won't be easy, and no one will leave until the truth comes out.

4297830.title: Nifty Smashers Origins
4297830.short_description: Round up your friends and get smashing in Nifty Smashers, a silly, fast-paced party brawler full of laughs, wild matches, and just the right amount of mayhem, whether you're playing together on the couch or online.

4297870.title: The Glorious Cause
4297870.short_description: A historically grounded, hex-based strategy and tactics game where you command armies of the American Revolution. From tense battlefield engagements to the growing war for independence.

4297920.title: Defend Against Cats
4297920.short_description: Defend Against Cats is a cute, casual tower defense game. Waves of mischievous fuzzy balls are invading your home! With your deadline creeping closer, defend your workstation before itâ€™s too late.

4297940.title: Bingo Roulette

4297940.short_description: Bingo Roulette is a casual strategy puzzle game where you select slots on a bingo board to earn points and complete bingos to collect bonus scores.

4298170.title: Carry the Pack Rack
4298170.short_description: One car, two drivers! Team up where one steers and the other pedals. Navigate obstacles without dropping the package. Play solo or join friends via local and online multiplayer co-op. Can you coordinate your moves to deliver safely or will you crash in chaos?

4298200.title: The Caretakers
4298200.short_description: Infiltrate contaminated residences and deal with their mutant pests using the most advanced tech of the 1960s. Set up a base and observe, probe, and most importantly, survive the grotesque creatures in this online co-op horror game.

4298430.title: Meow with Pipeline
4298430.short_description: Meow with Pipeline: a precision pixel platformer with rogue-like challenges. Guide a cat through dangerous pipe networksâ€”run, jump, dodge traps and master tough platforming. Tight controls and skill-based progression make every victory satisfyingly earned.

4299830.title: Dungeon Companion

4300200.short_description: Jump into the cockpit and become the hardest-working UFO in the galaxy! Vacuum up valuable minerals from the planet's surface, manage your resources, and upgrade your ship. 4300470.title: Look at our: Cyber-butts
4300470.short_description: An image discovery arcade game where you will test the abilities of voluptuous cyborgs. Complete the tests and unlock hot images and videos for your gallery.

4301110.short_description: A cozy top-down farming management game focused on planning and steady growth. Manage fields, machinery, and resources, upgrade your farm, and develop efficient processes at your own pace in a calm, strategic experience.

4301130.title: Riftborne
4301130.short_description: Riftborne is a classic terminal based,Â real time, grand strategy game. Data rich, spreadsheet like management. Construct space ships. Take part in factional warfare. Hire galactic hit-men on your rivals. Raid neighbors for rare resources. Become a spy and infiltrate enemy bases for key intel.

4301150.title: Absolved
4301150.short_description: Would you go through Hell if it meant freedom?Â  Faced with the choice of serving the rest of a life sentence or playing nightguard for a week. You thought the choice was an easy one to make. You couldn't be more wrong.

4301440.title: Prostitute-Pimp 2

No danger, no rush â€” just clever puzzles and peaceful exploration.

4301580.title: Greedy
4301580.short_description: A raccoon co-op horror extraction game. Infiltrate procedural ruins, loot everything and extract the relic. Mammon, the Greed Demon, is watchingâ€¦ Stay away from his curse!

4301790.title: Soluna Explorers: Tether Curse of Slimus

4301790.short_description: Soluna Explorers: Tether â€“ Curse of Slimus is a relaxed action RPG where you play as the monster, hunting roaming adventurers in a living world.

4302100.title: Screamer Streamers

You get to become a 16 year old girl named Carly who finally gets the chance to prove herself but at the cost that her nightmares might be real. A Visual Novel with sparse Rougelike gameplay.

4314770.title: SnekromancY
4314770.short_description: Snake, but you summon the undead in a roguelite horde-survivor dungeon.

4314780.title: Echowood
4314780.short_description: Relax and enjoy the tranquility of Echowood, an adventure farming simulator. The game takes place in a world where humanity has been displaced by nature. Humans have harmed nature too much, and for that, nature has destroyed them. Since then, the world has become calm and peaceful.

4314860.title: Dino Age: The First Fracture
4314860.genre: Action, Adventure, Indie, RPG, Free To Play
4314860.short_description: Awake in a prehistoric swamp and discover the primal world of Owen. In this standalone survival-RPG, you craft weapons, master skills like Hatching & Cooking, and battle â€˜Corruptedâ€™ dinosaurs. Defeat the Time Fracture Boss to save the Triassic Era.

4314930.title: You are the light â€“ An Audiovisual VR Journey
4314930.short_description: â€œYou Are the Lightâ€ is a procedural VR audio-visual experience that takes you through four scenes â€” Morning, Midday, Rain, and Night â€” on an emotional journey of light and music, where glowing particles form an immersive, musically choreographed light show in sync with the sound.

4314970.title: VANADEN
4314970.genre: Action, Indie, RPG, Strategy, Early Access
4314970.short_description: Vanaden is a first-person survival horror game set in a cursed, fortress-like labyrinth. Hide from monsters, solve puzzles, and navigate shifting corridors where stealth and every decision determine your survival.

4315040.title: Hearth and Hamlet
4315040.short_description: Gather resources and grow your settlement from a humble camp into a vibrant, magic-filled kingdom! Hearth and Hamlet is an incremental citybuilder game in a cozy pixelart style. Assign workers, unlock new buildings, policies, and magic, trade with faraway lands, and construct your ideal settlement!

4315120.title: Rescue Over 100 Town Cats
4315120.short_description: This is a 3D casual game in which you control the main character and explore the town to find and rescue over 100 lost cats. The cats are lurking around the town, lost, worried, troubled, and behaving in all sorts of ways.

4315510.title: Ashbane
4315510.short_description: Ashbane is a turn-based tactical RPG where you lead a mercenary guild in a world that rewards power and punishes mistakes. Recruit and customize your warband, take on dangerous jobs or strike at rival guilds, and lead expeditions where every encounter has lasting consequences.

4315610.title: Guns & Thorns
4315610.genre: Action, Adventure, Indie, Free To Play
4315610.short_description: Fight through hordes of bandits and a powerfull boss in this fast-paced, combat-heavy 2D-Pixel-Platformer. Explore the wild west-inspired world and discover many secrets lying within. Can you do it and regain what was stolen from you?

4315620.title: Case Closed
4315620.short_description: Case Closed is an 3D isometric point & click adventure with puzzle elements, you play as the ambitious police detective Gonzales who's investigating a strange murder of a famous hollywood actor.

4315640.title: Just A Man And His Ladder
4315640.short_description: Descend into a vast network of forgotten caves, twisting corridors, ancient ruins, and undiscovered terrain. As the last hope of humanity, youâ€™ll carve your own path by building and demolishing blocks, battling hostile creatures, and scavenging vital resources.

4315650.title: TET~CRAFT: The Fourth Temple
4315650.short_description: Be a young god learning, as you already are - always at least one better, if not me then at least Jesus - and as he advised, re-become childlike with a new digital space Lego(tm)! And no! You *don't* have to clean up after - nor will it hurt your (parents?) feet!

4316080.title: High Risk
4316080.short_description: An incremental investment game where youâ€™re never safe. You bet your money, sign high-risk contracts, and buy upgrades knowing one bad decision can wipe you out.

4316220.title: The Long Way Down
4316220.short_description: THE LONG WAY DOWN is a first-person digging action game where you carve your own tunnels in real time, mine valuable minerals, find unique items, and sell your finds to fund upgrades. Drill for oil, refine it into fuel, and keep pushing deeper. The deeper you go, the more demons you have to fight.

4318100.title: Tambo : The Last Night
4318100.short_description: On his first night guarding the vocational building, Jeri thought it would be a quiet shift. He had no idea that it would be his last night. As strange events began to unfold, forgotten pieces of tragedy slowly led him to a heartbreaking truth.

4318190.title: The No Arms Knight
4318190.short_description: TNAK is a 2D adventure packed with action and typing, where you'll need to type accurately, use your skills strategically, and type-type-type. You'll control Wailo, a knight who has lost his armor, and will defeat all his enemies to get it back.

4318250.title: Genesis: Voces de la Niebla (Voices of the Mist)
4318250.short_description: Investigate a murder at a lake marked by unexplained events. Play as a journalist trapped in his worst nightmare, explore unsettling locations, and survive a classic horror experience divided into three chapters.

4318400.title: I WILL DO IT SOON MAYBE LATER TOMORROW
4318400.short_description: A short narrative visual novel about procrastination, family, and the inner dialogue of a creative person. A story about how delaying decisions slowly erodes a life.

4318950.title: City of Hunger
4318950.short_description: A VR survival horror game inspired by 90s classics. Explore a city consumed by a parasitic outbreak, fight infected creatures with heavy weapons, and survive tense encounters where every sound matters.

4318970.title: Crime Union
4318970.short_description: Build your criminal empire from the shadows. Manage global networks, launder black money, hire specialists, and crush rival gangs in tactical card battles. In Crime Union, staying alive while the law watches your every move is just as hard as reaching the top. Don't get busted.

4319010.title: Idle Income
4319010.short_description: 400+ upgrades, prestige system, passive mining, unlockable currencies, perks, auto buyers, difficulty tiers and many more features - it's IDLE INCOME!

4319030.title: Kwartikum
4319030.short_description: An atmospheric puzzle adventure about guiding a lone figure through a strange land, discovering new ways to solve box based challenges.

4319100.title: Cleaning House
4319100.genre: Action, Adventure, Indie, Free To Play
4319100.short_description: Battle through a living hotel that feeds on fear. Blast monsters, collect buffs, and push deeper through procedurally generated rooms in this first-person horror roguelite where escape means facing what haunts you.

4319700.title: Mirage Of Tower
4319700.short_description: A pure platformer game containing nothing but platforming and the occasional wordless story. Dreamlike and surreal, yet full of multi-layered symbolism.

4319900.title: Medieval Survivors: Village Defense
4319900.short_description: A 3D first-person action-strategy game with a fresh take on tower defense. Build and manage your village by day, then fight alongside it to survive intense night waves.

4319930.short_description: A retro-style, rogue-like deck-builder where you play Video Poker. Collect unique cards, download powerful software and merge your cards to unlock new synergies and craft the deck you need to conquer the many challenges of Video Poker 95!

4320140.title: Awakewood
4320140.short_description: After your motherâ€™s strange funeral, a black rain blocks the roads and leaves you stranded. The air smells like rotting fruit and nature begins to mutate. Can you get out of here before the forest finds you?

4320230.title: The Peak of Life
4320230.short_description: By freely planning your studies and career, combining travel, business, investment, or even fishing to make money, purchase the property you like, catch the one you love, and reach the peak of your life. 4320730.short_description: A real time strategy, tower defense game where you can evolve your turrets and give them special abilities.

4321130.title: Coinsweeper
4321130.short_description: Coinsweeper is a roguelite that combines classic Minesweeper with risk management, deck-building and gambling mechanics.

4321750.title: Drift For Life
4321750.short_description: High speed, nonstop drifting, and one goal: the highest score. Drift For Life delivers a pure arcade drift experience.

4321890.title: Coral Social Club

4321940.title: Isekai Mage Girl Gacha Pull Simulator: Elemental Card Collection
4321940.short_description: Earn â†’ Pull â†’ Duplicate â†’ Sell â†’ Pull again. Your bankroll is roguelike until you complete the collection. A brand-new sequel is here from the creator of â€œSchoolgirl Card Pull Simulator,â€ which sold 1,000 copies in just two days!

4322000.title: DesktopDancer

4322160.title: Space Missions

4323230.title: Dark Watching Chapter 2
4323230.short_description: After crossing the bunker, you reach the shopping mall, but you quickly realize that there is even more of the virus thereâ€¦

4323880.short_description: LoopholeÂ is a 3D puzzle platformer with a top-down perspective, built around a unique time-loop cloning mechanic. Think steps ahead to choreograph a symphony of your past actions to solve puzzles that are impossible for just one person to overcome.

4323920.title: Only Clone
4323920.short_description: You wake up alone in a decaying underground bunker, you don't know how you got here or who you are, but you know the world before you are not what it seems. Explore the world, solve puzzles, and uncover the secrets that the AI overseer keeps hidden from you.

4323970.title: Your Fitness Wife
4323970.short_description: A cute desktop simulation featuring a fitness wife companion who casually strikes adorable poses, adding a soft, playful charm to your screen.

4324040.title: Echoes of Vision
4324040.genre: RPG, Simulation, Strategy, Free To Play

You'll assume the role of the Special Investigations Division Chief at the Bureau of Crisis Response (BCR), leading agents deep into Bleak Mountains City, a metropolis steeped in retro 1980s charm, to investigate and contain various supernatural â€œVisionsâ€.

4324270.short_description: Master the season in this 2D roguelike racer! Meet escalating targets against tough AI up to the finale. Invest tactically in upgrades & crew. Win to unlock new cars with unique abilities that completely change your strategy for the next run.

4324310.title: é£Ÿå±å•¦ä½  Eat Shit

But the road to find the toilet is dangerous, whether you can survive.

4324380.short_description: A casual Minesweeper game with a cat quietly accompanying you.

4324650.title: The Wreck That Should Not Be
4324650.short_description: When the mysterious Doctor Hoffmann hires your submarine to explore the east Caribbean sea, you accept, unware of the dangers that lie ahead...

4324670.title: Sky Mates
4324670.short_description: Sky Mates is a turn-based, multiplayer-only 1v1 tactics game in which you assemble a team of deadly steampunk pirates to gain control over a crumbling airship.

4324740.title: Deep Sea Bubble Shooter: Reflex Challenge
4324740.short_description: Deep Sea Bubble Shooter is a fast-paced reflex aim trainer! Pop the bubbles with precision and speed, master 150 levels, earn stars, unlock upgrades, and find the fastest ways to clear each stage for maximum points and thrilling bubble-blasting action.

4327140.short_description: ells is a small and minimalist mouse game built for calm, focused play. Click, interact, and enjoy clean visuals and satisfying feedback. No story, no pressure â€” just a relaxing flow and a soundtrack that shines with headphones.

4327290.short_description: Gotogra is a tactical roguelike deckbuilder where positioning shapes the battlefield. Choose a weapon for each run and master its unique deck, playstyle, and mechanics. Ascend the dungeons of a cursed castle and uncover the dark veil that overshadows the realm.
