4336820.short_description: Manage limited energy to power towers and repel alien hordes in this TD/Shooter hybrid. Protect the Control Unit at all costs while fighting for your own survival. Can you hold the line?

4336860.title: Amalu, Wells between worlds
4336860.short_description: Amalu: Wells Between Worlds is a pixel-art 2D platformer, and Metroidvania blending Atmospheric exploration, Spell-casting puzzle mechanics, Amazigh/North African mythology and an emotional storytelling

4336930.title: Under the  Gray Sky
4336930.short_description: In a world that has perished, a young man finds himself lost in an unknown underground city. There, spread out before him, was a strange city built from countless intertwined pipes, and a vampire girl living in solitude. ãƒ»This is a visual novel game featuring branching choices.

4336980.title: Set In Stone
4336980.short_description: A 2D platformer metroidvania. Discover a strange place where everyone was turned into a tiny stone. Fight difficult bosses, explore an interconnected world, and piece together the chaotic history of people who suddenly lost their humanity (or not?).

4337020.title: Amanecer
4337020.short_description: Juego 2D de terror psicolÃ³gico que combina exploraciÃ³n, ambientaciÃ³n inquietante y acertijos en una experiencia breve e intensa.

4337100.title: Unstimulated Simulator
4337100.short_description: Feeling too stimulated? Then get unstimulated across a collection of 20 â€˜minigamesâ€™ that turn mundane and anticlimactic tasks into a mundane and anticlimactic gaming experience.

4337170.title: My NEET Life
4337170.short_description: When a business-woman approaches NEET prodigy Akiko with the proposition that could change her life, she enters an entirely bigger world outside of her bedroom, full of work and... well, more work.

4337200.title: Antpocalypse
4337200.short_description: Many ants have become infected by the cordyceps fungus and are attacking their queens! Place ants (towers) along the paths of zombie ants and hopefully save every queen! Features: - Bespoke 2D art and animation - Multiple biomes - Original music - Satisfying ant deaths - Charming environments

4337220.title: Heisen-Bro Hustler
4337220.genre: Casual, Indie, Simulation, Strategy, Free To Play
4337220.short_description: You wake up in a gym bathroom stall with no memory. Suddenly you start receiving orders for gym supplements. It's time to start the hustle.Â  This game will take you on a journey from potty jockey to the ultimate Heisen-Bro Hustler. A lighthearted tongue-in-cheek, self deprecating play on gym culture

4337450.title: Hentai Age SCI-FI
4337450.short_description: A magical, relaxing puzzle game where you arrange tiles to reveal stunning artwork of lovely girls, enjoy calming music, and progress through increasingly challenging levels at your own pace.

4337500.title: GenkiNaru
4337500.short_description: A VR anime/Ghibli-inspired adventure to fix Genki's heart. Face negative thoughts in Genki's mind and smash them. Play as Genki doing healthy tasks and succeed in bringing Genki back to a healthy life.

4337510.title: Restless Nights
4337510.short_description: Restless Nights is a singleplayer survival horror game. Beat the game by learning and adapting to new threats added each night. Will you get a good night's rest? Or will you fall to the demons that lay behind shadows?

4337640.title: The Unbroken line ä¸æœ½é˜²çº¿
4337640.short_description: The enemy onslaught surges like a tidal wave! Ranged archers threaten your heroes, while colossal bosses seek to shatter your walls. Hold the immortal front! Face the endless challenge!

4337690.title: MEAT EATER
4337690.short_description: MEAT EATER is a pixel RPG game inspired by ancient Chinese history. In the game, you will play as the Zhu Jve of the game, recruiting soldiers with unique traits to build your own army and unify the world.

4337860.title: Slums: DriveBy
4337860.short_description: A gritty third-person action game set in the crime-ridden SlumCity where you take on contracts to gain money and use your fists, melee weapons and firearms to get ahead in the game. As you progress, use your cash to gain leverage- but remember, you got a Debt to pay, or else...

4338030.title: Kantmis-Zero
4338030.short_description: "Kantmis-Zero" is a boss rush action game. As the only chosen one on the Kantmis continent, you must follow the divine instructions and complete the trials.

4338090.title: Master Thief Simulator
4338090.short_description: Master Thief Simulator is a stealth-focused crime simulator where every move counts. Plan heists, sneak past security, pick locks, steal valuables, and vanish without a trace. Rise from petty theft to high-risk break-ins and become a true master thief.

4338100.title: Farming Pro Simulator: Season 26
4338100.short_description: Farming Pro Simulator: Season 26 is a modern farming simulator where you operate machinery, grow crops, protect your fields, and expand your business. Turn a small plot of land into a thriving agricultural empire.

4338180.title: Dearbnb
4338180.short_description: Buy, Decorate, Rent, Relax. Start with a tiny apartment, decorate cozy spaces, manage rentals and businesses, and rise from a poor neighborhood to the cityâ€™s most prestigious zones. A calming yet deep management experience where every room tells a story.

4338190.title: Reborn
4338190.short_description: A psychological horror narrative RPG where player choices shape a coerced life, lead to irreversible consequences, and determine how a descent into darkness unfolds through dialogue, decisions, and psychological tests.

4338240.title: Train of Thought
4338240.short_description: Train of Thought is a wholesome puzzle game set in a charming world of toys. Take control of a cute locomotive, help adorable characters by fulfilling their requests with the right wagons, and solve meaningful puzzles that slowly reveal a hidden story.

4338360.title: Dynasty Rush
4338360.short_description: "Dynasty Rush" is an official Chinese-themed TD game. Command legendary heroes and unique towers across iconic Chinese landscapes. Experience deep strategy infused with rich culture as you defend the realm. The vast empire awaits your command!

4338430.title: Waste Of Space
4338430.short_description: Waste of Space is a space-based card-collector and deck-builder where interplanetary bureaucracy is collapsing faster than your crew. Build decks, manage disasters, navigate faction politics, and decide whether to preserve Earthâ€™s rule, embrace post-human survival, or balance both.

4338450.title: Heavy Is The Crown
4338450.short_description: A casual 2-4 player couch/online rogue-lite round based fighting game. The losing players of each round vote on a unique debuff for the winner of the round to even the odds.

4338470.title: Only Jump
4338470.short_description: Climb upward using only the Spacebar. Jumping is more efficient than walking.

4338560.title: JOTT : Jump Over The Time
4338560.short_description: JOTT: Jump Over The Time is a fast-paced 2D precision platformer built around real-time hero swapping, mouse aiming, and movement mastery. Combining abilities across heroes opens countless routing possibilities and rewards creative problem-solving.

4338640.title: BALSEO: The Sea Beyond
4338640.short_description: BALSEO: The Sea Beyond is a stealth-action roguelite. Upon death, begin your voyage into the beyond. Traverse an ever-changing archipelago, master new skills, and choose wisely whether to face or flee from danger in the mystical southern fog.

4338740.title: Linza Tore
4338740.short_description: A co-op survival experience where the crew juggles thingamabobs aboard a train to stave off the end. Encounter crises, distort events via intentional and mistaken alterations, and sneak through mysterious zones along the undeviating railway while being hunted by ineffable beings. How far you can go?

4338780.title: MicroFab
4338780.short_description: Build automated chip factories in a post-collapse 2047. Process silicon wafers, research advanced tech, and scale from basic processors to legendary quantum chips. Optimize your production lines, outmaneuver mega-corps, and dominate the semiconductor market.

4338790.title: HOS - House of Shadows
4338790.short_description: An adventure/interactive narrative made using RPG Maker VX Ace. You take the role of Isabelle, and can push objects, build barriers, lockpick drawers. You must AVOID Fluids and Shadows. A little cheeky hint for you there. If you like atmospheric, and interesting stories, then this is for you.

4338810.title: GRUNGE: Count Your Bullets
4338810.short_description: A slower, more lethal post-apocalyptic singleplayer FPS. Explore, spot enemies, quick-save, count your bullets, hold your breath, headshot. "Lethal gameplay" without bullet-sponge enemies, survival chores, or limited saves.

4339040.title: My Little Merling
4339040.short_description: My Little Merling is a relaxing, Goddess-inspired magical fish tank simulator. Customize your Merling, explore vibrant tanks, adopt aquatic friends, play mini games, earn Magic Eggs, cast spells inspired by The Key of Solomon, enjoy Tarot readings, and unwind with enchanting music.

4339060.title: Press One
4339060.short_description: Press One is a short incremental game where you press one to make money, unlock more keys and upgrade your keyboard. As you unlock more keys, type words around your keyboard to activate insane buffs and multipliers.

4339200.title: Choiceline Brawl
4339200.genre: Action, Indie, Strategy, Free To Play
4339200.short_description: Turn-based card game with fast runs: Choose one of many heroes with unique passive abilities, build your deck from 10 abilities, and face tactically selected opponents. Fight, unlock cards, and dominate short battles.

4339340.title: The Forgotten Killer
4339340.short_description: Survivor or Killer. Team up or go solo, move carefully, and outsmart your enemies. In the dark, mysterious Forgotten Forest, every choice matters. Survive, escape, or dominate â€” the choice is yours.

4339400.title: The Breakfast Serial Club
4339400.short_description: Join a serial killer enthusiast group to solve the town's recent murders in this mystery visual novel adventure, featuring point-and-click and text-based investigation and a detailed story.

4339590.title: No Clean Start
4339590.short_description: This is not a clean start. Explore a hostile world that reacts to your actions and remembers your mistakes. Learn through observation, failure, and persistence. Each new run is not a reset â€” itâ€™s a transformation.

4339650.title: Depengate
4339650.short_description: Play with a friend and dive into an intriguing cooperative adventure, solving puzzles together in tense and atmospheric circumstances. Take on the roles of two researchers trapped inside an ancient pyramid, where your only guide to escape is your voice.

4339680.title: Totally Safe Moon Project
4339680.short_description: A giant meteorite is about to hit Earth. The Moon is your last hope. Work together with friends to build a fragile tower from everyday objects.

4339730.title: My mom is out there
4339730.short_description: Your mother disappeared 15 years ago, a mystery surrounds a hospital, and you live in seclusion in the apartment directly across the street. Use your computer to retrace the last clues left by your mother and try to solve this mystery.

4339750.title: Tidal Break
4339750.short_description: A discovery puzzle roguelite. Combine elemental fish to unlock new elements and uncover the first secrets of an abandoned island before the tide resets everything.

4339810.title: DIY Pinball
4339810.short_description: DIY Pinball is an arcade management sim where you design and build the pinball machines that you install in your arcade. Persistent NPCs with unique personalities use evolutionary learning algorithms to adapt, developing favorites and becoming regular patrons at your arcade. What will you build?

4339890.title: Handmania
4339890.short_description: Handmania is a roguelike survival Rock-Paper-Scissors game. You have to use your instincts and reflexes against hordes of enemies to SURVIVE!

4339920.title: Animentals
4339920.short_description: Welcome to the whimsical world of Animentals! Explore and craft new creatures and build up your team as you adventure to restore life to elemental islands. Unlock new skills and potions plus build up and customize your base as you fight against a growing corruption sweeping over the land.

4339960.title: Type Strike
4339960.short_description: Aim for simultaneous strikes, chain massive combos, and compete for top scores and high ranks in this fast-paced, reflex-driven strategy challenge. Juggle multiple agents, make split-second decisions, and master timing to stay aheadâ€”every move counts in this thrilling test of skill and strategy.

4340180.title: Ash of the Covenant
4340180.short_description: A fast-paced action roguelike where brutal melee combat meets dangerous divine power. Accept blessings from forgotten gods, build powerful synergies, and face the hidden cost behind every gift.

4340190.title: BattleVox
4340190.genre: Action, Indie, Massively Multiplayer, Early Access
4340190.short_description: A low-poly battle royale FPS with up to 100 players. Fight online against real players or play solo offline versus smart AI bots across large-scale maps, with deep progression, loot, and customization.

4340200.title: Shipping and Handling
4340200.short_description: A chaotic co-op delivery game about traversal and teamwork. Get a shared payload through hostile environments while navigating terrain hazards, managing limited resources, and dealing with enemies along the way. AND DONT FALL OVER!

4340290.title: Cosmic Order Fleet
4340290.short_description: Command planetary fleets in Cosmic Order Fleet! a minimalist RTS driven by real-world physics. Outsmart global rivals in 1v1, 2v2, or 6-player brawls. Use "Shield Burst" to flip the tide. The universe is vast, but the leaderboard has a peak. Conquer the galaxy and defeat the world!

4340340.title: Black Omens: House of Crimson Silk
4340340.short_description: Black Omens: House of Crimson SilkÂ is a first-person, single-player, escape room puzzle horror game set in a fictional Edo Japan. Assume the role of Idate Chiyo, a paranormal investigator, tasked with investigating an abandoned mansion and unveiling a family's dark and horrifying secret.

4340560.title: BLOCLASH
4340560.short_description: Stylish visuals, music, and effects bring this game to life! A simple yet strategic competitive puzzle battle!

4340600.title: Team Principal: A Racing Manager
4340600.short_description: A deep yet accessible motorsport management sandbox inspired by the 1990s games of this genre. Manage teams, drivers, finances, engines, and regulations in a fully customizable, ever-changing world where no two seasons play out the same.

4340610.title: IRIS
4340610.short_description: IRIS is a short psychological horror experience about being watched, controlled, and haunted by what was taken from you.

4340810.title: Echoed Nights
4340810.short_description: Trapped in a realm of shattered memories, monsters hunger for you to join them in decay. Navigate this first-person indie horrorâ€”collect fragments, evade the creatures, and uncover what you left to rot. Your memories may echoâ€¦ but your scream might not.

4340880.title: VILOVEJETS
4340880.short_description: The aliens have decided that Earth is an ideal target for an attack. Now, as the commander of a spaceship, you have to defend your home planet!

4340900.title: å¥³ä¸–ç•°-Josei
4340900.short_description: The setting is a hotel lobbyâ€”an â€œExit 8â€-like game. There are multiple correct patterns, and you must memorize them each time. A guaranteed brain overload.

4340940.title: Between
4340940.short_description: A story-driven visual novel set on a quiet coastal town, where fleeting connections, unspoken desires, and personal choices shape how every relationship unfolds.

4341000.title: Donut Die
4341000.short_description: Unleash violent magic in Donut Die, a top-down auto-shooter Roguelike. Wield multiple staves, synergize runes, and blast through hordes of enemies to crush the Evil Dessert Corp's conspiracy. The donuts must die!

4341080.title: HearHenï¼ˆæ”¶éŸ³é¸¡ï¼‰
4341080.genre: Casual, Indie, Simulation, Free To Play
4341080.short_description: Summon your favorite characters, match fun backgrounds, and let them accompany you to listen to music and move to the rhythm together!

4341140.title: The Last Shot: Underworld
4341140.short_description: The Last Shot: Underworld casts players in the role of an aging scientist who, by a sinister twist of fate, finds himself deep in the dungeons of Metropolis. Build, explore and survive!

4341190.title: Eternal 4 Rounds
4341190.short_description: A tower defense game with real-time strategy elements in a fantasy setting. Your task is to defend and repel enemy attacks on the map while increasing your rank as an army commander.

4341240.title: Static 13
4341240.short_description: Static 13 is a strategic card game that combines classic Pyramid Solitaire mechanics with roguelike depth. Set in a 1990s retro aesthetic, you must master card combinations to clear the pyramid across 13 unique and challenging levels.

4341280.title: LetMeSee
4341280.short_description: A collection of fun and relaxing puzzle games.

4341300.title: AutoDice
4341300.short_description: Auto Dice is a dice-building roguelike auto-battler where you build a party, explore dungeons, and challenge powerful bosses with the ultimate dice. Good luck.

4341360.title: Sister
4341360.short_description: Feeling that your computer desktop is too plain? Want to find a cute girl to keep you company? Then try this desktop pet sister!

4341390.title: Nightsoil
4341390.short_description: Nightsoil is a story-driven adventure game where you play as an old gong farmer on his last shift through the miserable streets of cholera-ravaged 1854 London. During the night, you will discover the mysterious manâ€™s history and the close bond between him and his horse, Olâ€™ boy.

4341460.short_description: A precision platformer where every fall costs you progress and your beauty. Climb an unforgiving tower, master the charged jump, and prove yourself to the hero waiting at the top. Inspired by Jump King and Celeste.

4341550.short_description: Survive until 6:00 AM in a cooperative asymmetric horror game. Watch cameras, control doors and lights, guide teammates, and complete deadly tasks inside a hostile facility. Communicate under pressure as systems fail, monsters adapt, and one mistake can get you killed. Finish the work. Repeat.

4341560.title: Out of Time
4341560.short_description: Immerse yourself in a multisensory vision of creation. Out of Time is an award-winning VR installation blending fine art, meditation, and art therapy. 4341590.short_description: This is a world filled with a vast amount of random elements. Obtain random equipment and skills through card draws, use maps to enter random stages (you may even enter reward stages that require no combat at all). Continuously acquire stronger items to challenge tougher stages and bosses.

4341650.title: The Night We Met
4341650.short_description: Live a wild Halloween night with Alex, Anna, and Sierra across four Acts. Flirt, play an intense Truth or Dare, and shape the story with meaningful choices. Unlock 8 unique endings and experience all the fun, and consequences, of your actions.

4341760.title: The reception is over... or is it?
4341760.short_description: The reception is over... or is it? â€” a candid visual novel for adults. An ordinary evening reception at a private clinic turns into a story of forbidden passion, where professional boundaries collapse under the pressure of sudden, inexplicable attraction.

4341810.title: LarsGadiel
4341810.short_description: LarsGadiel is the prequel to Xenon Valkyrie, a game originally created for Nintendo's 8-bit console that was never released (at least for now), but is now coming to Steam. It's a classic Metroidvania, featuring the original maps and design from that era.

4341950.title: The Unclosed Case: Pike
4341950.short_description: A narrative-driven detective thriller. Reed and partner Grant investigate a murder case that resets through a time loop. Gather clues, interrogate witnesses, build timelines in the mind palace, and uncover the truth through deduction and multiple endings.

4342060.title: 101 Dogs Hidden in Tokyo
4342060.short_description: Join this adventure and discover the hiding places of 101 dogs in TokyoğŸ¾ in the hand-crafted landscape. ğŸ† Earn tons of achievements. How many ğŸ¶ can you find? ğŸ” Be quick! â±ï¸

4342070.short_description: Join this adventure and discover the hiding places of 101 dogs in MadridğŸ¾ in the hand-crafted landscape. ğŸ† Earn tons of achievements. How many ğŸ¶ can you find? ğŸ” Be quick! â±ï¸

4342080.short_description: Join this adventure and discover the hiding places of 101 kittens ğŸ¾ in the hand-crafted Vancouver landscape. ğŸ† Earn lots of achievements. How many ğŸ˜º can you find? ğŸ” Be quick! â±ï¸

4342100.title: 101 Cats Hidden in Naples
4342100.short_description: Join this adventure and discover the hiding places of 101 kittens ğŸ¾ in the hand-crafted Naples landscape. ğŸ† Earn lots of achievements. How many ğŸ˜º can you find? ğŸ” Be quick! â±ï¸

4342110.title: DATE TEACHER
4342110.short_description: "Play as Arthur in a dating sim where honesty is optional, but consequences are real. Your partners possess sharp intuition they will detect your lies and confront you instantly. Lose their trust, and the date ends abruptly with a harsh evaluation. 15 partners. Infinite tension. Watch your words."

4342150.title: After the Stream Went Dark
4342150.short_description: A short but intense hand-drawn visual novel following Nyx, a VTuber, exploring the emotional turmoil of who you are when the stream is off. Make dialogue choices to shape a branching narrative, enjoy fully voice-acted performances, and experience a gripping soundtrack that brings the story to life.

4342160.title: Racing Balls
4342160.short_description: A fast-paced arcade racing game where consistency wins championships and legends enter the Hall of Fame. The tracks are designed to reward clean lines and good timing. Every run is about reading the rhythm in order to achieve the perfect lap time.

4342180.title: Ice Melts 2: Caribbean Cruise
4342180.short_description: Federal agent Jack boards a luxury cruise ship undercover, hunting smugglers hiding behind champagne smiles. Three womenâ€”each tied to the caseâ€”will test where duty ends and desire begins. Choose your path at the Captain's Cocktail.

4342230.title: Project Alex
4342230.short_description: Meet Project Alex â€” your intelligent desktop companion. She lives on your active windows, sees your cursor, and talks with you via voice in real-time. Powered by Godot & Local LLMs, she runs 100% locally on your PC. No internet required.

4342300.title: Color Theory
4342300.short_description: Color Theory is a fully ray-traced arcade game featuring two game modes. The first is an arena shooter in which you can only destroy enemies by shooting their reflections. The second is a puzzle game in which you look for matching marbles and point out impostors.

4342380.title: AGGRO
4342380.short_description: AGGRO is a chaotic arcade survival game where farming meets rage. You only have 8 minutes to withstand endless waves of enemies while harvesting crops for demanding clients. Time is running out to survive!

4342500.title: The House They Left Behind
4342500.short_description: A first-person horror game about returning to a familiar place that no longer feels safe. Explore a remote house, search for your missing grandparents, and uncover what was happening right in front of you all along.

4342510.title: Tom Lander: The Exiled King
4342510.short_description: Pilot wacky aerial vehicles with QWOP-inspired controls through colorful retro-futuristic levels. Struggle to stay airborne while performing deliveries, rescues, firefighting missions, bombing runs, and chaotic dogfights. This game will remind you that flying is hard, but landing is harder.

4342570.title: Gospodar's Tales
4342570.short_description: A Romanian folk horror about a simple farmer, a wealthy neighbor, and a hunger for money that leads to an unforgivable sin.

4342710.title: Hexa Castle
4342710.short_description: A turn-based 1v1 game where dice, strategy, and pure competition collide. Every match starts from zero. No advantages. No pay-to-win. Only your mind, your moves, and your luck.

4342850.title: Three Bridges - Portal Defence
4342850.short_description: A dark fantasy medieval tower defense game with roguelike progression. Defend three bridges against hordes of nefarious creatures that covet the portals to the peaceful realms. Collect loot, craft broken builds, and return stronger.

4342890.title: FighTurd
4342890.short_description: Become #1 while being a #2! Play as an unlikely hero in this quirky action-platformer! Leap into a humorous adventure through dangerous environments, battle creative foes, and master combat as you search for your missing friends.

4343160.title: Canter Cove
4343160.short_description: Canter Cove is a charming horse ranching sim where you'll explore the wilderness to capture wild horses. Care for, train, and breed your horses to discover rare coat colors and patterns. Sell your steeds to visiting guests and build up your ranch!

4343180.title: 6-7 In-A-Row
4343180.short_description: A modern tabletop-style strategy game for 2â€“4 players. Local or online with friends, bots from Easy to Hard, and hilarious win/lose lines based on how hard you actually won. Place tokens anywhere on the board and line up 6+ in a row to win. Winning with 6 countsâ€¦ technically.

4343210.title: Your Busty Waifu
4343210.short_description: A lightweight desktop companion that brings a charming, busty anime waifu to keep you company on your screen.

4345010.title: Cosmos Iter
4345010.short_description: A skill-based arcade game focused on fast reactions.

4345020.title: ç™¾å°ºæ§˜
4345020.short_description: The "Hachishakusama" legend at a massive scale! A student visits his grandparents and encounters "Hyakushaku-sama"â€”a 100ft tall entity. A 20-minute comedy-horror playable with just a mouse. Can you survive this BIG night?

4345060.title: BUDGE
4345060.short_description: Carry big loads on a perilous path! TEAMWORK of budge-buddies is key for this co-op adventure with up to 8-players

4345230.title: Dwell
4345230.short_description: A young woman named Minh Thu, desperate to escape her suffocating life, breaks down in the middle of nowhere and accepts shelter in a remote house. As the night wears on, unsettling events reveal that something in the dark is terribly wrong.

4345290.title: Women of Xal 2
4345290.short_description: Women of Xal II is a high-stakes political adventure and multi-path visual novel. You play as Xjena, the newly appointed Matriarch of Xanasca, navigating dangerous politics, personal vendettas, and an impending catastrophe known as The Great Silence.

4345370.title: Blackjack Simulator 2026
4345370.short_description: Blackjack Simulator 2026 allows you to experience what it's like to play the world's most popular casino card game.Â  Build your bankroll and earn steam achievements while leveling up and reaching milestones as you play.

4319350.title: Within of Static - Northgate Mall
4319350.short_description: You play as Dylan Miller, a night security guard assigned to watch over the nearly abandoned Northgate Mall. What starts as a quiet shift of cameras and radio calls slowly turns into a night where something inside the mall doesnâ€™t want to stay hidden.

4319480.title: Heroes of Tomorrow: Hidden Potential
4319480.short_description: Lead a team of young heroes against criminals, cultists, demons, and midterms. Will you carry on your heroic legacy or forge your own path? A text-based, 600,000-word interactive superpower novel.

4319530.title: Doppler
4319530.short_description: Die fast. Restart even faster. Scream a little. Meet Doppler, a small blue bundle of rage with a red bandana in the wind.

4319640.title: Commutator

4319660.title: Moon Garden
4319660.short_description: A cozy incremental game about growing your way home. Strategically plant flowers, optimize machinery, and grow your tree tall enough to escape!

4319800.title: Final Orbit
4319800.short_description: Master the cockpit of highly realistic spacecraft in this Newtonian physics based sim. Take off from surface to space, plot a course between the planets and dock with space stations. Trade commodities or take shipping contracts to buy upgrades and optimize your build - every choice matters.

4320080.title: rooms
4320080.short_description: This is a walking horror game in which players explore rooms and identify strange anomalies.

4320330.title: 3D Maze 95
4320330.short_description: The maze that hypnotized a generation is back. It was a screensaver. But now? You can finally walk those halls yourself. Or just relax and watch, like the old times.

4320430.title: Lunar Chrysalis
4320430.short_description: A box garden escape game. Su Li wakes up to find herself in an unfamiliar room, with monsters lurking around and strange symbols...she explores and solves puzzles in this eerie space, confronting the ever-approaching monsters... all to seize a glimmer of hope and escape this place!

4320800.title: Empire Origin
4320800.short_description: Idle tycoon meets Wall Street. Run businesses, trade 200 stocks, price options with real Greeks, watch the Fed tank your portfolio. Multiplayer shares one market across all players. Your save file is just a seed and your decisions - replay your entire financial history perfectly.

4320870.title: Animonia
4320870.short_description: Step into the world of Animonia, where mysterious creatures roam and a legendary Animon enters your dreams. Embark on an unexpected adventure, discover magical beings, and shape your journey as you play and experience the game.

4321350.title: Loginnnnnn
4321350.short_description: Team up with up to 3 friends in online co-op to breach 10 ultra-realistic login screens with Physics-Driven Cursors! To unlock the final mini game, you must use fectly log into 10 fictional online services without a single mistake. Do you ready to get stuck at the login page???

4322710.title: Challenger's Sleep
4322710.short_description: Challenger's Sleep is an underwater collectathon that pulls you down from the bright Sunlight Zone and into the Sohm Abyssal Plain - and then deeper still. Can you take on the challenge and discover what lays at the bottom, or will the mystery stay sleeping below the waves?

4323020.title: Cradle of the Rift
4323020.genre: Action, Indie, RPG, Free To Play
4323020.short_description: Our game is a 3D Roguelike where you play as a fairy as you fly through a forest, slashing and blasting your way through hordes of monsters to reach home.

4323210.title: United by a Fairy Tale
4323210.short_description: Help the princess and the elf escape the tower together by controlling both at the same time, one with each hand, and defeat the evil stepmother and the Prince Charming!

4323520.title: XeGrader plus
4323520.short_description: A fantasy shooter where exploration and puzzles are keys to victory. In a world of meticulous pixel art, uncover secrets hidden in every stage. Collect powerful upgrades, defeat fantasy monsters with precise shooting, and forge the world's fate!

4323770.title: Polydangerous
4323770.short_description: You lost your body. Now fight to earn it back, contractor. Polydangerous is a roguelite tower defense where you mine, build, and shoot your way through waves of enemies. Die, come back with more knowledge, and discover synergies until your build breaks the game.

4324760.title: Room Service
4324760.short_description: You are the only maid working a night shift at an old hotel. Your duties are simple, clean the rooms, fill in reports and survive the night.

4324830.title: Steps into Corruption
4324830.short_description: Steps into Corruption is an adult visual novel where a young couple discovers the world of swinging and open relationships.

4324840.title: Peace Under His Roof
4324840.short_description: Peace Under His Roof is a short psychological horror focused on atmosphere, sound, and the uneasy calm of a place that was never meant to feel safe.

4325080.title: Cadets Stories: Year One
4325080.short_description: Experience the lives of adult artillery cadets in early 2000s Ukraine - a story-driven visual novel with 4 minigames, performance-based endings for 9 characters, and mature content.

4325120.title: You Lose: Retry
4325120.short_description: You Lose: Retry is a fast-paced minimalist precision platformer built for intense, seconds-long runs. Reach the exit as fast as possible through shifting light and darkness, traps, and moving platforms that change at the last moment. One mistake and you lose instant restart, no loading, no mercy.

4325150.title: Unknown Explorer
4325150.short_description: A sci-fi ARPG featuring strategic elemental combat. Create multiple male or female warriors, master Fire, Ice, and Lightning skills, and level up through 7 tiers of power. Battle undead and robotic foes to break the cycle and uncover the truth. Conquer infinite mazes and climb global leaderboards.

4326830.title: Monster King
4326830.short_description: A bite-sized retro JRPG centered on exploration, monster capture, and turn-based battles in a classic 8-bit fantasy world.

4326920.title: A Few of Us: Operation Nightshade
4326920.short_description: Hack enemy defenses with your keyboard, deploy your squad, and upgrade your units to survive the AI assault, all from behind the screens in this tactical mash between typing game and tower defense.

4327010.title: å§‰å¦¹é“ä¸­åƒä¸¡ç®± : Edo Village Nightmare
4327010.short_description: "Big Sister..." For some reason, the lonely young girl Onene feels she must have an older sister. Who exactly is Onene's sister? The mountain village where she was born and raised has become a mysterious labyrinth. Onene's journey to find her sister has only just begun...

4327570.title: Remnant Generation: Prologue
4327570.short_description: Remnant Generation: Prologue is a first-person atmospheric horror set in a secret underground laboratory. An experiment with the Fourth Dimension went wrong. You are alone, cut off from support. The creature cannot be killed â€” only avoided as you explore and try to escape.

4327650.title: Plaser
4327650.short_description: Plaser is an arcade shooter where you aim for the gaps between rotating asteroid belts to destroy planets. With auto-movement, use Dash and Attack to penetrate the debris shield and hit the core. Upgrade your Attack Power and Time Limit to extend your run and master the rhythm of destruction.

4327690.title: How to Train Your Spirit: The Exorcism of a Busty Ghost
4327690.short_description: Set in the Edo period, you are the last Onmyoji, called to an eerie estate for an exorcism. The source is a lewd, busty female spirit. As the final master of a forbidden art, your goal is to bring spirits to climax and purify them. Yet this one feels differentâ€¦ a hidden truth lies beneath.

4327770.title: Maid Card Gacha: Collect, Display, Complete
4327770.short_description: Earn, pull the gacha, sell, and pull again. Until you complete the Maid Girl card collection, your money management is pure roguelike. The powered-up sequel to â€œSchoolgirl Card Pull Simulator,â€ which sold 1,000 copies in just 2 days, is here!

4327940.title: Portal Worlds
4327940.genre: Adventure, Casual, RPG, Strategy, Free To Play
4327940.short_description: You crossed a portal to survive, but what will you become on the other side? Explore dangerous regions, recruit mecha maidens, craft gear, and fight endless waves of monsters and bosses in this epic Idle RPG. Play solo or with others, grow steadily, and see how strong you can become.

4328090.title: Chrysalis: Chrome Butterfly
4328090.short_description: Â«Chrysalis: Chrome ButterflyÂ» â€“ a cyberpunk neo-noir thriller. Play as Wendy, an agent with memory gaps investigating a disappearance in Neo-Kyoto. Switch between choreographed combat and detective work to uncover a conspiracy where reality is an illusion. But is the truth worth knowing?

4328190.title: Anomaly: Haunted Aisle
4328190.short_description: Explore a looping supermarket aisle in a first-person psychological horror walking simulator. Observe the environment to spot anomalies: turn back when something is wrong, otherwise move forward. Progress reveals a story of guilt and grief, as a man searches for his lost wife and son.

4328320.title: OVER SAND
4328320.short_description: Take to the steampunk skies! Defend your flying ship over endless sands from mechanical hordes. Master turret firepower, switch weapons, and craft synergistic perk builds mid-wave. No movement â€” pure skill!

4328590.title: ARCANATI CARD
4328590.short_description: Collect Urban Legend cards and fight in this deck-building roguelite! There is no "hand"â€”cards are randomly placed, making "positioning" the key to combos. Adjacency effects, chain reactions, and a twist of fate. Dominate the chaotic board with synergy and uncover the truth.

4328620.title: Slavic Warband
4328620.short_description: Slavic Warband is a tactical RPG in which you lead a pack of peasants searching for a better life in early medieval Eastern Europe. Explore, fight, equip, and level up your company to ultimately create your own small kingdom.

4328690.title: DREADCELL
4328690.short_description: A first-person psychological horror game. Explore an abandoned underground bunker, uncover its secrets, and face a repeating cycle that watches your every move. Atmospheric, narrative-driven, no jumpscare spam.

4329030.title: Edge of Divinity
4329030.genre: Action, Adventure, Indie, RPG, Free To Play
4329030.short_description: Ascend the Tower as Effy and Kira in this fantasy, anime-inspired action roguelite. Explore magical biomes, gain power ups, and fight enemies to reach the Celestial Realm (or get kicked back down to basecamp!)

4329740.title: Destiny Worlds - Sci-Fi Visual Novel
4329740.short_description: An Interegalactic Sheriff needs to solve the mystery of a new terrorist known as the Dragon Whisperer before it is too late. For fans of Science Fiction and Anime, as well as Visual Novel enthusiasts who want to uncover every secret ending there is.

4329800.title: DICEASTER
4329800.short_description: This is a hard game. Very hard. You play as a die, and your goal is to climb. Simple, right? Wrong. Each level leaves you with less room for error, more risk, and less hope. Honestly, I donâ€™t think youâ€™ll make it. But if you doâ€¦ glory awaits. Will you make it into the top ranks?

4330360.title: Azure Infinity
4330360.short_description: Azure Infinity is an SRPG set in a nearâ€‘future sciâ€‘fi world with a military mecha theme. As a SRT member of the secret mercenary organization Yggdrasill, you will pilot the huge humanoid weapon RAIV to carry out a range of missions and confront the crisis approaching this world.

4330620.title: Unlatched
4330620.short_description: Escape from a trio of killers in this Single-player Asymmetrical Horror game. Enemy patrol patterns and objective spawn locations are based on RNG, ensuring a unique experience for every playthrough.

4330820.title: Deck Breakers
4330820.short_description: ã€ŠDeck Breakersã€‹ is a story-driven auto-battler. Play as rebel, assemble a squad aboard the giant ark Salvison, and uncover a dictatorial conspiracy. Use combat chips and formations to command your team in spectacular auto-battles. Strategize, break the walls, and lead the Breakers to freedom.

4332200.title: King's Bet
4332200.short_description: The King banned gambling and threw everyone into a dark industrial well. Kingâ€™s Bet is a roguelite card game where poker hands power rusty machines. Manage your cards, use your weapons, and fight to escape. Luck is not enough! You need strategy to survive the well.

4332330.title: Colorful Craftworks
4332330.short_description: Colorful Craftworks is a 2D puzzle game where you paint objects to change their properties and create new paths. Use colors to extinguish flames, transform obstacles, and solve carefully designed stages filled with creative, trial-and-error based challenges.

4332700.title: 6 Floors
4332700.short_description: You find yourself in a strange place and the only way out is within. Navigate liminal corridors and rooms filled with psychological terrors as you traverse all six floors of this mysterious place in order to save your soul.

4333040.title: Waifus Achievement Clicker
4333040.short_description: Earn 100 easy, time-based steam achievements while clicking to love cute waifus across 24 levels!Â All for less than the cost of a can of coffee!

4333090.title: Expandaball
4333090.short_description: The bigger the ball, the bigger the challenge. Use your pandaâ€™s growth to reach new heights in this addictive physics platformer.

4333240.title: DUSK OF WAR
4333240.short_description: DUSK OF WAR is a base-building game with resource and human management in a post-apocalyptic world where resources are limited. The game is played in real time and allows you to alternate between base management phases and real-time tactical combat.

4333680.title: DreeM Ascension
4333680.short_description: Explore the DreeMScape Darklands and uncover it's dark secrets in this story-driven survival horror boomer shooter.

4334670.title: ARTMESS
4334670.short_description: Seeking her lost drawings, Maya and a mysterious companion enter a Slavic fairytale world turned nightmare. Explore stunning locations, meet mythical characters, and battle the darkness to uncover the truth!

4334680.title: Kill Line
4334680.short_description: Can you survive below the invisible "Kill Line"? In this narrative survival sim, play as Sam, a veteran scavenging on the streets of Los Angeles. This isn't just survivalâ€”it's a final resistance against being erased by the system.

4334690.title: ç«¥å¹´è¯¡äº‹å½•
4334690.short_description: A 2002 China rural primary school-set horror puzzle game: The protagonistâ€™s younger brother vanishes mysteriously after school. Searching the school, they face eerie supernatural events, solve mechanical puzzles to deduce the truth, and reflect on left-behind children and school violence.

4334710.title: å¤¢é…”ã®ãƒãƒ¼ãƒ†ãƒ³ãƒ€ãƒ¼
4334710.short_description: A hazy, dreamlike visual novel with a touch of the surreal. Step behind the bar of a mysterious, ethereal space. Craft cocktails, share quiet conversations, and connect with your guests' hearts. Mix drinks as you please, and lose yourself in this gentle, dreamlike world.

4334780.title: Hakuroku Game Collection
4334780.short_description: Hakurokuâ€™s board games are coming to digital! Play three titles solo or in multiplayer!

4334850.title: Carol and the Bells: A Cozy Strategy Game
4334850.short_description: Carol and the Bells is a cozy, turn-based strategy game played on a grid. Build a deck to shape what appears on the board, manage risk, and decide when to ring the bell and move on.

4334870.title: Evac Point
4334870.short_description: Evac Point is a co-op survival shooter where you cross a massive post-apocalyptic town to reach extraction. Manage hunger and thirst, scavenge supplies, craft what you need, and fight through zombies and hostile factions in a long, high-stakes escape.

4334910.title: Craving Wisps
4334910.short_description: Slide in the walls, possess your enemies, and discover a mysterious world threatened by wicked spirits! This short adventure, full of action and humour, will please platformer fans and players looking for an original experience!

4335040.title: Iron Graves
4335040.genre: Action, Adventure, Casual, Indie, Simulation, Strategy, Early Access
4335040.short_description: Command a squad of salvage drones in deep space. Remotely breach derelict hulls to scavenge for fuel and parts while managing scarce resources. Watch your signal, monitor environmental hazards, and pray your sensors aren't lying. You are alone, and something is moving in the dark.

4335140.title: Quarantine
4335140.genre: Action, Casual, Indie, Free To Play
4335140.short_description: A co-op multiplayer survival game where players run a quarantine checkpoint together during an outbreak. Inspect survivors, manage shared resources, argue over decisions, and survive the consequences... or sabotage each other when panic sets in.

4335170.title: Chaoslands
4335170.short_description: This game is a pixel-styled, turn-based sandbox game. Collect around 50 items and build or find 100 obstacles accross the world. Build ships to cross water and enter the caves to collect advanced resources. Fight 2 bosses and level up.

4335210.title: IMRY
4335210.short_description: IMRY is an atmospheric isometric RPG set in the 1970s Soviet taiga, where your choices shape a story of survival, identity, and a reality that refuses to stay still.

4335270.title: SHED
4335270.short_description: Flush your friends. Burn the deck. SHED everything. SHED is a competitive card-shedding game where your goal is simple: get rid of everything before your friends do. Perfect for game nights, parties, or friendly rivalry. Remember, the last player out earns the title nobody wants.

4335290.title: Monster Tower
4335290.short_description: Monster Tower is a high-octane retro platformer where you must ascend a deadly tower filled with beasts and traps. Jump, blast enemies and use your energy shield to survive the auto-scrolling madness. Can you reach the top... or survive the descent?

4335420.title: Hentai Sora
4335420.short_description: Hentai Sora is a sensual puzzle game about a cold yet dangerously attractive girl. Solve levels, unlock explicit scenes, and slowly reveal her desires as the tension rises with every move.

4335440.title: Focus Knight: Productivity RPG
4335440.genre: Casual, Indie, RPG, Free To Play
4335440.short_description: Focus Knight is a relaxing focus and productivity RPG. Set a timer, stay focused, and watch your hero automatically explore dungeons, fight enemies, and grow stronger. The longer you focus, the greater the rewards.

4335540.title: Lepidarium
4335540.short_description: Relax and collect unique butterflies and moths. Witness the real-time lifecycle from Larva to Pupa to Butterfly. Customize lush greenhouses and discover rare species in this cozy idle game. Let your sanctuary flutter in the background while you work or study!

4335600.title: Manifest Anything
4335600.genre: Indie, Simulation, Free To Play, Early Access
4335600.short_description: An AI-powered simulation sandbox where players generate, explore, and play games created in real time.

4335630.title: Legatus
4335630.genre: Indie, RPG, Simulation, Strategy, Early Access
4335630.short_description: LEGATUS is a Roman legion simulator focused on the harsh reality of military life. Recruit and train legionaries, construct fortified marching camps, and manage vital supplies. Lead your men through hostile territories, crush tribal resistance, and secure the frontiers for the glory of Rome.

4335880.title: Last Light Left
4335880.short_description: A roguelite in which you fell strange beasts using a slot machine. Manipulate the reels to stack the odds in your favor and conquer the many foes standing between you and a princess begging to be saved.

4335890.title: Can deliver?  Survival Kit
4335890.genre: Action, Adventure, Casual, Indie, Racing, RPG, Simulation, Sports, Strategy
4335890.short_description: A car simulator where the player needs to deliver items from one end of the map to the other.

4335900.title: Mine Digger
4335900.short_description: Mine Digger is a minimalist mining game where you dig deeper, uncover hidden riches, upgrade your tools, and turn a simple hole in the ground into a profitable underground empire.

4335910.title: Catch the Turtle
4335910.genre: Action, Adventure, Casual, Indie, Racing, RPG, Simulation, Sports, Strategy
4335910.short_description: A clicker game. The player must sit and watch the screen attentively, waiting for a chicken to run past, and then click on it with the mouse to catch it.

4335960.title: The 4 Masked
4335960.short_description: A 4-player co-op FPS adventure where you swing through trees using vines, escape wild animals, and survive dangerous biomes. Each player has a unique role, and teamwork is the key to survival.

4336300.title: Health Audit Simulator
4336300.short_description: Step into the shoes of a Health Auditor. FIND, FLAG and RATE potential Risks and Hazards across 20 playable environments, between two differing difficulty variants.

4336790.title: Cyan Soul (Demo)
4336790.short_description: An arcade style, pixel art, boss-rush puzzle action game. Move your character up, down, right and left! Dash through enemy attacks and obstacles! Pick up objects and hurl them at the boss to cause damage! Gather enough points and unleash max damage with a powerful projectile or form!

4336960.title: Save the President : Trust Issues
4336960.short_description: A social deduction party game where trust is fragile, roles are hidden, and one mistake can cost the President everything. Complete tasks, fix the systems, and figure out whoâ€™s lying.

4337700.title: HAKO TOWER
4337700.short_description: Welcome to HAKO TOWER, a physics-based tower builder! Stack blocks, scream as they fall, and dodge obstacles. And... adore Hako. A tiny hamster who just stares at you... He canâ€™t help you... Heâ€™s... just... a hamster, after all. Test your luck and skill!

4337900.title: Clicky Bunny
4337900.short_description: Click, upgrade, and unlock! Collect Carrots to power up your progress, master a minigame for Hearts, and Ascend to earn Keys, while each run is slightly different. Spend your tokens to unlock animations and images!

4338710.title: Delivery Time
4338710.short_description: Jump! Grind rails! Boost through the city and deliver packages as quickly as you can while also scoring some style points! Get ready for frantic time trials, loaded with parcels to deliver to happy customers.

4338750.title: Stack Order
4338750.short_description: Face unique bosses and uncover an intricate story in this narrative-driven roguelite deckbuilder. Upgrade and stack your cards strategically to unleash powerful synergies, counter boss actions, and progress through a handcrafted, mysterious world.

4339410.title: Operation: Manor
4339410.short_description: Operation Manor is a provocative, satirical multiplayer game about maintaining appearances at all costs. Work to keep up the illusion of a harmless agricultural facility or sabotage it from within as a Traitor. There are no heroes here. Only roles, reports, and consequences.

4339530.title: Runeomicon: Training Room
4339530.genre: Action, Indie, Strategy, Free To Play
4339530.short_description: Practice rune drawing outside the ritual. Runeomicon: Training Room lets you train across multiple difficulty levels and sharpen your skills without the threat of failure. Learn the patterns, build muscle memory, and prepare yourself for the relentless pressure of the full ritual in Runeomicon.

4339850.title: Dust
4339850.short_description: Dust is a first-person survival game set in a post-apocalyptic world filled with zombies. Explore an open environment, gather resources, manage hunger and health, craft weapons, and build shelters to survive in a hostile world.

4339970.title: First Class Rescue
4339970.short_description: Climb the mountain by building your path in this cute & cosy roguelite puzzle platformer. Make your way to the top of the mountain to rescue the residents of Pine Peaks!

4340250.title: Myriad Realms
4340250.short_description: Thousand Professions Realm is a single-player game inspired by classic 2D side-scrollers, with diverse classes, tons of equipment, and gear-tied visuals. Explore the fantasy realm solo, grind levels, boost power, and customize looks via gear. Enjoy pure hack-and-slash fun.

4340310.title: æ”¿é€šäººå’Œ
4340310.genre: Indie, Simulation, Strategy, Free To Play, Early Access
4340310.short_description: "Peace and Prosperity" is a independently developed ink-wash style historical strategy game set in an alternate pre-Qin period of China. Starting from a small village of just a few hundred people, and conquer all sides to gradually build their own vassal state with millions of people.

4340370.title: å…«é•·èª¿ã¨ã„ã«ã—ãˆã®æ¥½è­œ
4340370.short_description: Shirabe Hatcho and Ancient Music Score is a puzzle-solving ADV game where you solve the puzzles by ear. Listen to audio, read music, and play an instrument. Use your sense of pitch to solve the mystery and prevent the phantom thief from committing his crimes as a member of the detective agency.

4340380.title: Launch President
4340380.short_description: President Launcher is a simple physics-based sandbox game created purely for fun. Tap the launch button to send the president flying into the air, and use sliders to adjust gravity and launch power. There are no goals or rulesâ€”just experiment the unpredictable, over-the-top physics simulation.

4340640.title: Zeri Factory
4340640.short_description: ZeliFactory is a falling-block puzzle Ã— 2D action game where you control both the blocks dropping from above and a freely moving character called Zeli at the same time, clearing lines to earn high scores.

4342170.title: Deadly Dimensions
4342170.short_description: A solo roguelite horror. Traverse multiple procedurally generated Dimensions of Earth and scavenge all of the Data you can possibly find from them to sell it to a faceless Corporate entity.

4342560.title: Cyber Traps & The Detective Squad
4342560.short_description: Set in a Brazilian school, it is a Point-and-Click game focused on solving puzzles and mysteries concerning the dangers of the digital environment. The plot features anthropomorphic characters inspired by Brazilian fauna, known as the 'Bando Detetive'.

4342720.title: VILE
4342720.short_description: A grotesque plague is mutating and reanimating Londonâ€™s deceased. Parliament has ordered you specifically to eradicate the hordes of undead and discover the source of the infection before the capital collapses in this retro FPS.

4343220.title: SCP Studies
4343220.short_description: In this game you explore a SCP Facility, while trying to stay sane and finish objectives by completing everything the SCP's have to offer. Interact with anomalous objects; experience, avoid, destroy, and use them. Learn how the facility operates and try to to keep it running as long as you can.

4343350.title: Punk Plush Panic
4343350.short_description: Punk Plush Panic is a chaotic 2.5 platformer in which players swap between 3 characters, using their explosive elemental combinations to fight off waves of gluttonous aliens.

4343400.title: æŒ‚æœºä¿®ä»™
4343400.short_description: è½»æ¾æŒ‚æœºï¼Œä¿®ä»™æ— å¿§ï¼ä¸€é”®[~]éšè—ç•Œé¢ + ä»»åŠ¡æ !Â Â è£…å¤‡å¼ºåŒ–é‡é“¸ç¥å“çµçº¹ã€é‡‡çŸ¿ç‚¼å™¨æ‰“é€ å¤©çº§è£…å¤‡ã€ç‚¼ä¸¹æé€Ÿçªç ´å¢ƒç•Œã€å±æ€§ä¸¹å †å è·¨é˜¶ä¼˜åŠ¿ï¼Œ ç»˜åˆ¶ä¸“å±ç¬¦ç®“ï¼Œå¦‚æŠ€èƒ½èˆ¬é‡Šæ”¾æ”»å‡»ã€é˜²å¾¡ã€è¾…åŠ©ç­‰ç‰¹æ•ˆï¼Œç¬¦ç®“å¸ˆç­‰çº§è¶Šé«˜è§£é”è¶Šå¼ºç¬¦ç®“ï¼è‡ªåŠ¨ä¿®ç‚¼ã€çµç”°ç§æ¤ã€çŸ¿æ´é‡‡é›†ã€åŠŸæ³•æ­é…ç­‰ä¸°å¯Œç©æ³•å…¨è¦†ç›–ï¼Œä¸€æ­¥æ­¥çªç ´å¢ƒç•Œï¼Œæœ€ç»ˆæŒ‘æˆ˜è½®å›å¡”ã€‚å¯åŠ ç¾¤1080655844æ²Ÿé€š

4343490.title: Rogue Bytes
4343490.short_description: Rogue Bytes is an in-depth, incremental roguelite game about going rogue in the byte-verse! Defeat enemies, collect Bytes and other loot, research and unlock upgrades, level up your weapons, and become a byte legend!

4343500.title: Radical Crepe Smuggling Game
4343500.short_description: Crepes are scarce in the city. Our Rad friends bring in regular supplies at random drop points on the roofs. The greedy garks will steal them all, so we have to outsmart them and move the crates each day. Unique gameplay swapping roles in single player or multiplayer coop. Hurry for your best score!

4343510.title: Cyberknight: Awakening
4343510.short_description: Awaken in a kingdom where magic has been long forgotten. Build your deck, engage in real-time strategy combat, and stop the corrupt technological uprising in this cyber-fantasy roguelike.

4343540.title: Sweetie Candy Maze: Violet Plum
4343540.short_description: Dive into a vibrant candy world! Collect delicious sweets and find your way through playful violet plum mazes in this sweet and colorful adventure.

4343560.title: Lost in Reefs 2
4343560.short_description: Play the sequel of the underwater Match3 game "Lost in Reefs" from Rumbic Studio. While other Match-3 games support only one gameplay mode (Swap or Chain), Lost in Reefs 2 goes a step further by now including 4 game modes.

4343600.title: Mo Wu Tian Gong
4343600.short_description: Mo Wu Tian Gong is an open-world survival-action game set in mythic ancient China. As both builder and warrior, you will "plan with ink, fight with steel" in a fractured yet beautiful world. Survive by gathering resources, constructing shelters, and farming.

4343610.title: Beachcomber
4343610.short_description: Take a quiet walk along the shore, collecting unique shells with each new wave. Find ones that speak to you, or seek out ones with hidden surprises. How you play is up to you. Discover the world inside every shell.

4343620.title: Pantheon
4343620.short_description: Manage a mysterious machine as it summons and consumes eldritch entities in this incremental game. Every entity consumed makes the machine more powerful, and unlocks new mechanics.

4343660.title: Stabilize
4343660.short_description: Stabilize is a grid-based puzzle game where you block the flow of energy by placing and rotating tiles. Tiles can only be placed where paths connect, and every placement is permanent. Clear puzzles quickly to climb the global leaderboard and compete for the best time.

4343690.title: Saylor Animals Puzzle
4343690.short_description: Saylor Animals puzzle is simplictic jigsaw puzzle game with different animals puzzles

4343800.title: HaCo
4343800.short_description: "Deliver or Destroy? The choice is yours!" High-speed jet action meets heist mechanics in this up to 4-player online co-op. Pilot rusty robots, master the inertia, and dodge missiles to steal packages. Can you meet the quota before time runs out?

4343840.title: Hentai Clicker: Sunny is streaming
4343840.short_description: ğŸ–ï¸ğŸ”¥ Step into a hot beach fantasy with Hentai Clicker: Sunny is streaming! Click to collect â¤ï¸, unlock sexy lifeguard outfits, and upgrade your skills in this addictive anime clicker. Flirty voice lines, steamy progression, and nonstop summer teasing ğŸ˜ˆğŸŒ´

4343860.title: Sandwich Shop Simulator
